column3:
“I tried Granddaddy Purple for the first time yesterday. I'd looked forward to trying it all week after reading these reviews. Seriously, I think I was MORE excited to try the strain than a kid looks forward to Christmas. 
The taste is so sweet. The smoke is thick and heavy with the sweet under taste. Nice!
5 minutes later....nothing. No effects whatsoever. 
10 minutes in, my only effect was boredom. No!
15 minutes in...”

“Just tried this for the first time. It really does smell and taste sweet like berries. GDP struck me as a creeper strain. I didn't realize how high I was until I tried to actually do things. I totally lost track of my phone for about a half hour. This feels very sedative. It's a very heady high that to me almost feels like a sativa, but it is relaxing instead of energetic. This is definitely a evening and night strai...”

“GDP! This is by far one of my favorite stains. There is something special about purple buds. I love the physical high of this strain, it's so heavy and relieving. After smoking it, you just sit back and think, WOW" I am HIGH!”"

“My IndaCouch MellowGiggleMunchyChill longtime fav!..this beautiful, sweet Luv Child of Purple Urkle/Big Bud is soo KIND!!..she'll take you to the SlowSleepySillySexySide of Life! & a little goes a long way"..she's A-Must-Have for this StonerHippyChick!..No Anxiety & No Pain after a few Hooka bowls of my coveted GDP!!..I HighLy suggest to all my Canna Friends!!..Be Well..Peace & JAH.....”"

“I enjoying this strain a lot! I usually don’t do indices but compared to my usual medication I feel more of a smooth high and for some reason I was very active initially and just wanted to clean… now I’m mellow and I think my tolerance is getting up there because I smoked a good amount and I need to smoke again :)… absolutely no paranoia and I usually am very paranoia prone so thats a plus and this may be another one...”

“True Grandaddy Purp when grown properly smells and tastes like berries and the leaves will turn a solid purple while the buds will have a 50/50 look of green and purple with a silvery type look. The smell of this bud should fill an entire room when you have a bag of it in your pocket. The smoke is smooth and savory with that classic purple berry flavor lingering with a heavy hitting high that lasts for hours. This st...”

“this is my second review on this strain and I have to say that it is my favorite strain for night time.  I am really not a huge fan of most indicas, I prefer sativas, but granddaddy purple is the best indica I have ever had and I can't get enough of it.  the smell of the buds are very fruity and berryish, the vapor tastes earthy with a hint of sweetness.  the high is quite euphoric with a mild couchlock feeling and c...”
“I absolutly love this strain. I struggle with Bipolar type 2, as well as anxiaty and anger... you name it. GDP is my Emergancy Button in times of severe stress and physical and mental pain.

column2: like a warm thick fuzzy blanket was gently placed around your entire body. you feel relaxed. whatever it was that shoved you way down into that chaotic and destructive low/mania is now reduced to a...”"

column3: “Makes me relax hard. I love stretching it out on this strain; I've used this before a massage and before the odd yoga class to great effect. Such a chill euphoria! A great way to wind down in the evening for sure.”
“The last of the Dama Medical Weed. To bad,  it went recreational. I really liked this strain. If you get a chance to use this medication PLEASE do.”

“I have yet to try a better Indica.  I like it best between 22 and 25 pct thc for the longest and strongest effects.  This is my go to flower on those day's you are at a level 5 or above and need solid relief from pain, nausea, depression and pretty much anything that might bother you.  Definitely would recommend.”

“Granddaddy was the first medical marijuana I ever tried and it still remains a favorite. All of my Generalized Anxiety Disorder quirks and things were eliminated and I was able to speak openly and honestly for the first time I could remember in a long long time. If you are depressed and need a pick-me-up, grab a friend and a couple grams of this strain. Thumbs way up. 

Oh yeah, I was totes high as fuck too, so that ...”

“Love this strain! 😌 It had me so relaxed. I suffer from PTSD so getting to sleep and staying asleep is difficult...I smoked a little of this before bed and in no time I was falling asleep and actually had a good sleep. ☺ It smells sooooo good too 😋 haha”

“Love it. It tastes fucking great and it relieves you instantly and you can laugh and relax but still get some stuff done before the couch lock sets in. Clear headed. relaxing high and so fun. Could not recommend more.”

“Really good stuff. This is both a body and mind relaxation strain that will make where you are sitting or laying down on feel like clouds. Not that you can't get out of the couch lock if you need to or just wanna get something to eat. 
I highly recommend this near bedtime due to GDP putting you out to sleep later on. Makes a great sleep aid, and pain killer if you are someone looking for something to give you the Z's...”

“Reunited.... and it feels so good! Seriously, this strain is a hands-down, heavy-hitting indica with classic indica effects. The dense dark nugs with shiny crystals makes this flower an eye-pleaser. The aroma is slightly sweet and fruity with a hint of earthy pine in the background. This strain only takes a few hits to feel the seemingly ever-lasting effects. Novices should use caution as too much at once will leave ...”

“when i smoked this, me and my friends weren't high... we lit a joint, smoked a few bowls, blew through a g and didnt feel a thing. and then about 5 mins later i experienced something a little like being a bunny rabbit with wings riding a cloud into an ocean of flowers.”

“A friend brought this over, he said it was called Granddaddy Purple, I've heard of the strain once on leafly but never had any interest to read about it, This is now by far my favorite Indica strain, The taste was very sweet, gave me a buzz that lasted long and gave me an unforgetable high, felt super relaxed & happy, Sativa lover or not, you should definitely try it out if you ever get the chance!”

“GDP is my new favorite Indo! Hands down. This is what I've been looking for in a medicinal sort of cannabis (I'm not a medical user, though but sometimes when I do feel under the weather, I go for a good medicinal Indica). I love the come up, the high, and it even set me back down to planet Earth gently. My only concern with GDP is that it's the munchiest herb I've yet tried, so score a sack of this and order a coupl...”

“The sweetest strain I've ever tasted. The exhale seriously reminds me of a grape Popsicle.

It's a potent indica, with an extremely mellow body stone that's great for relaxation and pain relief. One of my favourite indicas. Do yourself a favour and score some of this dank-ass ganja.”
“I thought this was more of a head high than a body high in my opinion. I listened to this Creedence Clearwater Revival song Ramble Tamble"
column4: it tripped me the hell out but it was so amazing. I would recommend listening to music while smoking this. I always get the munchies too. When I smoked this
column5: me and my friend were out in a cornfield. The sky had an overcast
column6: all white clouds. It made me feel like I was in the mi...”"

column3: “Great for my insomnia and cuts my insulin need in half. Pain management is great here too. Really relaxed and chill smoke to go to bed with.”
“This is one of my favorite strains and not for the color, although it's beautiful but it's very relaxing 😈🙂😴😏”

“Wow, you can tell when you got some GDP in your hand/crusher. The purple is crazy. So much purple I knew I was gonna be on the couch all day. I was right. Very euphoric for me with a very relaxed sleepy feeling. Only con is the dry moth and slight dizzyness. But other than that GDP is a very unique strain. I'm going to take a nap now.”

“The Grandfather of Purple! What an amazing friend. For me it has a earthy, yet grape sweet like smell. It's effects are exactly what I need. It calms down my muscle spasms in my back and neck which cause terrible headaches. It's a creeper so if you blaze and sit down, there is a possibility of a power nap. Which is okay with me. It helps my mind clear before the final zzzz 's.”
“Grand daddy purple is exactly what you need after a hard days work. Any time you want to sink into the couch and forget about everything around you take a couple puffs of grand daddy.”

“I have lupus, fibromyalgia, arthritis, and neuropathy from diabetes.  This has been the only strain that helped reduce pain, but also helps me sleep throught the night. I haven't slept that we'll in years!”
“Most say its a sleepy smoke. I have found it to be delicious to taste and very effective for public anxiety as well as pain management”

“This strain was very smelly when I got it. I found it to be very uplifting and joyful, feeling like the world is such a great place and there's no reason to worry about anything. I also noticed a nice body buzz and also the same feeling behind the eyes. I would say this strain is very good for someone with a mood disorder. I say that because I have one and it helped me alot with returning go serenity after being extr...”

“It's a very pretty bud, but gets dry too easily. unfortunately, the high doesn't last as long as I'd prefer, but still feels awesome. I personally like how it doesn't give me crazy munchies. And if you smoke enough of it, it gives you this great feeling where you can't feel your legs and feet”
“-BLACK BELT BUD- Grandaddy Purps! Love this stuff! Nice smooth grape flavor. A now favorite. The Diesel of Indicas" Very sativa like hi”"

“Beautiful glistening bud with a lovely smell and taste! 
So smooth. I absolutely love this strain. Lovely heavy comfy indica. Hazy sleepy giggly, warm and fuzzy. Had me floating through waves of arousal. It kept me hot and bothered for a while. Powerful flower.  

Experience: This strain is extremely relaxing/sedating. Felt the tension in my body melt away very fast. Back pain vanished into thin air after about 15 mi...”

“I smoke a ton of weed.
Have been for 20 years.
GDP... hands down the tastiest smelliest mellow evening weed out there. Mid range thc so there is no paranoia or anxiety. A good batch should be Purple green and orange and stanky. 

Morning = harlequin

Noon= sour diesel 

Evening= grand daddy purp”

“Living as a fundamentalist Mormon in southern Utah, good bud can be hard to come by. However, each of my four wives are excellent nug-sleuthers. Granddaddy purps is my favorite strain to smoke because it leaves me mellow and relaxed when my wives are yelling at each other about scripture interpretation.”

“Beautiful glistening bud with a lovely smell and taste! 
So smooth. I absolutely love this strain. Lovely heavy comfy indica. Hazy sleepy giggly, warm and fuzzy. Had me floating through waves of arousal. It kept me hot and bothered for a while. Powerful flower.  

Experience: This strain is extremely relaxing/sedating. Felt the tension in my body melt away very fast. Back pain vanished into thin air after about 15 mi...”

“Helps me to lower my opiate script in half, no joke!! Certainly a great medicine.  Doesn't knock me out but definitely not a day time strain, use AGO for daytime when you're not working, still looking for one that will allow me to be productive at work w/out too much of a head high.... Probably a higher CBD or lower THC would do the trick.... Keep looking folks, the perfect opioid buster is out there!!!”
“Knock out power all day everyday but for the heavy weight a couch duel with grandad is a comfortable way to spend any spare time.”

“I just smoked this. Great High. I'm more of a Sativa person. Of course my user name tells it all. I'm so relaxed and numb. I was on the phone with my sister and i was crying about something and i'm so high I didn't even feel my tears. But i knew i was crying. The smoke was smooth.”
“Me and the wife got stoned and she got horny and we went and made love. I love weed”

“I've waited a while to get my hands on some authentic GDP for a while now, that being said I was finally able to. The strain admits a scrumptious, sweet, almost grape-like aroma when fresh and gives even better flavor when vaporized. This strain is top notch, its effects are both cerebrally euphoric and physically relaxing which offers great relief for body aches whilst keeping your mind stimulated.”

“I've waited a while to get my hands on some authentic GDP for a while now, that being said I was finally able to. The strain admits a scrumptious, sweet, almost grape-like aroma when fresh and gives even better flavor when vaporized. This strain is top notch, its effects are both cerebrally euphoric and physically relaxing which offers great relief for body aches whilst keeping your mind stimulated.”

“I picked up a couple of 1g pre-rolls of this over at Corvallis Cannabis Club. This was strong stuff, testing at 29%+ and, though they were pre-rolls, I was pleasantly surprised. The taste was sweet and grapey, as advertised, and the effects came on quickly. Very relaxing and sedative -- almost narcotic, in fact. My body felt like a big wavy noodle, vibrating in the breeze. After I finished my evening walk, I headed o...”

“🍰...O.PEN 420 RESERVE VAPE:  Arizona Grown Organic 
Clean & Pure... No Fillers, Easy-on-the Lungs and verry Effective!..Lots of Laughter, Stoned-Silliness
  and
 Munchy Madness!!! Assists my f'n Chronic Pain Symdrome and RA Inflamation so I can SLEEP!..makes me feel reeeaal goood all over😍...I want to Eat everything in sight (not like me)...

Coveted 
GP has a Beautiful grape/berry Flavor, Is Fast Hitting & Long-La...”

“I just smoked some Grandaddy Purp this morning for the first time. A couple hits kept me high for a couple hours. The taste is fruity like grapes and so is the smell. The nugs are beautiful looking. It's amazing I highly recommend it.”

“Pop The Top The Smell: Floral, fresh grass, a little sage like on the hits of citrus notes. 
The Bud: Pretty fat quarter nuggets, pretty frosty with purple under tucking green calyxes. Fox tailing purple bloom towards the rounded beveled top. Really fine and happy looking buds. Crackle! & Snap! Wow! These nugs like to show off how well they sound, just delightfully cured when you notice such nice AMSR break to your b...”
“If you want an inevitable couch lock" this is your strain. GDP has yet to let me down with its powerful Indica body effects and it's amazing taste
column4: it's just an overall incredible Indica. If you haven't tried it your missing out definitely give it a go the next time you see it! Helps best at night
column5: great for pain
column7: depression and insomnia. If you need a strain to just knock you out and put you in a very rela...”"

column3: “fuckin love this shit. it's amazing. smoked it out of a waterfall, got STUPID high. smoked it out of a pipe, loved the taste. rolled a j, a great high. mixed it with some Cali grade the other day in the waterfall... 3 hits and i was done. I was watching the musical RENT and i was finally seeing everything in the movie for what it truly was. life meant something. it was truly beautiful. REALLY recommend everyone tryin...”
“It's a nice high”
“It's a nice high”

“By far my favorite strain, very nice smell & look, great indica, after a bowl instantly locked in the couch after raiding the fridge, great for pain relief, depression, & sleep, highly recommend this strain”

“Ah classic granddaddy purps! When the top shelf GDP arrives at my dispensary it will always find a way in my medicine box! For me it's not a heavy indica it gets me relaxed, happy, giggly, and hungry. Vaping GDP is a delight! Earthy batch of sweet berries and the aroma could be a aphrodisiac to any connoisseur.”

“GDP is a strain I keep going back to time and time again.  The smell and taste are always supreme.  Sweet, rich, complex, with an aroma of grapes and a hint of coffee.  Incredibly dense bud structure.  One of the best strains for insomnia.  Great euphoric indica effect that's highly sought after by medical patients.

I've tried GDP at countless dispensaries and I find that it tends to be one of the most consistentl...”

“🍇🍬 Granddaddy Purple is a work of art. A marvelous Indica, highly praised and sought after for it's visual appeal and famous, dreamlike effects. Smelling as close to a grape as you can get, she is almost tempting enough to eat. The beautiful dense nugs are almost too pretty to grind. GDP will most likely put you on the couch, with an ear to ear grin. Amazing medical benefits for those in pain or stressed out. This ...”

“GDP...!!  Wow.  This isn't a strain to be taken lightly.  While I tend to find myself gravitating towards the Sativa dominant strains for their clarity, focus & energizing effects, I wanted something for the evenings to basically knock my lights out and sleep deep.  This strain delivers like a sledgehammer - it's not subtle.  Its initial effects will render most casual users inoperable when consumed in average" amou...”"
“Decent Indica strain,  zombie like high. Felt the tension in my body slowly fade away and felt like a puddle of relaxation.”

“GDP is my go to strain for THC when I want a psychoactive high. I LOVE the effect it has. Extremely soothing and uplifting.

The smell is a little fruity. Admittedly not the best tasting strain in the world, it is earthy, and bitter like an IPA compared to smooth pilsner. 

Doesn't hit you very hard in the head at first. For this reason the body high creeps up on you. Be careful you don't overdo it if you're new beca...”

“This strain is very good,I feel very relaxed,
No pain , creep up on you 👻 l feel 😎 like
Real mellow , calm . Good for my pain and depression 👍”

“This strain has to be one of my favorites EVER!!!! Its a perfect body high that fits my liking perfectly. The high settles in with a head change and then out of no where your body starts to feel extremely good and you become stuck in place and don't want to move. This is also a perfect strain for insomnia. I suffer from insomnia and GDP did the trick and helped me fall asleep everytime.”

“All I can say is WOW, GDP is so smooth when taking hits and isn't too harsh on the hits, GDP is a slow creeper but settles itself in nicely, if you want to go on a real adventure of your mind and its capabilities try this https://youtu.be/YOTPPIHg41g and let your mind run free I promise you you'll know the magic I'm talking about”

“🍇🍬 Granddaddy Purple is a work of art. A marvelous Indica, highly praised and sought after for it's visual appeal and famous, dreamlike effects. Smelling as close to a grape as you can get, she is almost tempting enough to eat. The beautiful dense nugs are almost too pretty to grind. GDP will most likely put you on the couch, with an ear to ear grin. Amazing medical benefits for those in pain or stressed out. This ...”
“Classic strain with potency to back up its colorful aesthetics. Great for pain, stress, depression and insomnia.  Also has a nice euphoric head high accompanying the body buzz. 1st class.”

“GDP is my go to strain for THC when I want a psychoactive high. I LOVE the effect it has. Extremely soothing and uplifting.

The smell is a little fruity. Admittedly not the best tasting strain in the world, it is earthy, and bitter like an IPA compared to smooth pilsner. 

Doesn't hit you very hard in the head at first. For this reason the body high creeps up on you. Be careful you don't overdo it if you're new beca...”

“GDP is a strain I keep going back to time and time again.  The smell and taste are always supreme.  Sweet, rich, complex, with an aroma of grapes and a hint of coffee.  Incredibly dense bud structure.  One of the best strains for insomnia.  Great euphoric indica effect that's highly sought after by medical patients.

I've tried GDP at countless dispensaries and I find that it tends to be one of the most consistentl...”
“helps me concentrate less on the current ptsd panic attack”
“Heavy couchlock, relaxing and helps with sleep”
“Ken's GDP from Sungrow Collective.... real deal Holyfield purps, caked up and all purple bud with that sweet grape purple taste”
“Possibly one of my favorite strains of all time. This strain will make you an astronaut after you hit it a couple times. I highly suggest GDP for pain and stress or if you just want to chill out.”
“helps me concentrate less on the current ptsd panic attack”

“I bought this strain for sleep and ten minutes in, I'm happy and talkative, but in a good way. Definitely gave me a boost in mood (which I could always use), and now as I'm typing this, my body feels heavy in the best possible way. This strain definitely lives up to its hype. In love right now...”
“My favorite strain of all time! The perfect euphoric, relaxing, couchlocking stone ideal for listening to EDM and watching trippy visuals.”

“For a $10 a g bud, I give this a 5 star hands down. If it cost $15, I'd still give it at least 4 stars. I'm for sure going to be coming back to this strain!

Firstly, it wasn't as purple in appearance as I expected. The flower did look nice; symmetrical, nicely trimmed, a few hairs, a few crystals, and a nice forest green color. It ground up nicely. Once it was ground up, I could see sprinkles of nice deep purple fla...”

“I rarely give 5 star reviews anymore, 
but OMG .... and the bag appeal is nice. Def top shelf, 5 *

As i suffer from anxiety, this indica delivers the Perfect Puch...with no Paranoia 

THREE P'S for these purps! Btw, this bud is LOUD smell wise,. ......unfortunate if you are using discretion”

Firstly, it wasn't as purple in appearance as I expected. The flower did look nice; symmetrical, nicely trimmed, a few hairs, a few crystals, and a nice forest green color. It ground up nicely. Once it was ground up, I could see sprinkles of nice deep purple fla...”

“Extreme relaxation, extreme couchlock.

It gives me happy, pleasant feelings. I know that's a very general statement, but it is  moreso than just any weed.

The high is always light in a sense, never overbearing. The more you smoke, the more comfy you get in your own body. I have feelings of loving and bonding with people rather than having judgement for people.

If sative strains make you a bit paranoid or bugged o...”"

“I bought this strain for sleep and ten minutes in, I'm happy and talkative, but in a good way. Definitely gave me a boost in mood (which I could always use), and now as I'm typing this, my body feels heavy in the best possible way. This strain definitely lives up to its hype. In love right now...”

“This one creeps up on you, you don't really feel it until a few minutes later on in the smoke. Great smell, smoked up my car and left it smelling a surprisingly good sweet and berry smell. The buds looked pretty dirty and not much crystals, but that's probably from the way they grew it. I got it from Vermont. Good body high and gives you a slap in the face, not to get up and do something but to sit down and relax. I ...”

“Oh yes, this is one of our favorite PM in da couch highs...Pain Relief Heaven, thanks to our fav Budtender at YHS... yummy huge purp nugs baked us goood...smile giggle forget laugh munch smile...ideal for happy hippie heads everywhere!! Peace, Jah, Be...Namaste!!”

“This is definitely a strain where if you smoke it you will most likely not move off of the couch for a while I found that it made me extremely sleepy not long after smoking it and couldn't find the motivation to move except to my bed to take a nap recommend if you have sleeping problems it will definitely do the trick and has a nice high to it as well.”

“• this review is for a T 70.6% pure indica oil cartridge from Advanced Grow Labs in CT, which has an amazing, high % terpene profile, (+ for which I look) bc it ensures I'll love the fruity, 🍇y flavor! • Stimulates hunger, nausea ceases, pain + anxiety melt away as relaxation thoroughly takes over & Friday nite couch-lock happily begins! • Cerebral, psychoactive qualities suggest Gdp is likely best-suited for non-ne...”

“Tonight I'm vaping BOM's brand of Granddaddy Purple.  I am NOT a fan of BOM brand cartridges because the plastic tip makes the weed taste plasticky. I'm glad I only got a half gram of it.

I do, however, REALLY like Granddaddy Purple!  It does have a sweet berry taste mixed with lemon.  Yum!  This cartridge of BOM's tested at 72.81% THC and .71% CBD and I'm enjoying a fun cerebral high while couch locked watching Str...”

“Note: I myself am on the autism spectrum, and find it can be hard to find information of how weed affects neurodivergent folk like myself, so I hope the insight of this autistic girl (I'm pointing at myself. I'm really stoned so I think I'm funny (stoned on GDP, in fact!)) might help others like me. That said, everyone is different, so what helps me may or may not help you. <3

I suffer from frequent headaches, occas...”
“Wonderful taste, wonderful pain relief of PMS. Will definitely buy this one again.”

“GDP--->Entirely mellow and upbeat happy high not so potent leaving you heavily stoned-no paranoia or anxiety feel calm cool n collected enough to talk to dad chill enough not to have my high noticed! I feel like I am the black mass point at the head of a superhero or end of a superhero's sword...totally Mellow--as if I just sniffed a fat line of Xanax! Upbeat type of insurmountable mellow to keep you up! 

Felt inshi...”
“GDP is a pure indica strain. it provides great pain relief benefits, and also provides amazing anti-depression,  and anti-insomnia factors.”
“Taking for pain and muscle spasms.  The sleepiness and arousal are both awesome added bonuses.”

“Granddaddy Purple. I love it, its such a beautiful piece of bud, and it smells so delicious. I love that it has purple on it. It makes it look unique. The high lasted with me for about 3 hours. It made me feel like theirs no worry in the world, so peaceful, I love that about this bud. No stress, no pain, no nothing. Its a great strain, that I would recommend it to anyone who need this time of relief. I will admit, th...”

I have used both flower and concentrates, however this review will be on flower (the concentrate is just as good, just obviously more potent!) Obtained from Herbs4You in Denver, CO


Upon first opening the container you will notice a wonderful aroma of what ...”

“GP is one of my favorite strains. It kills my stress and anxiety immediately. At first I thought it was a hybrid because it's such a great, relaxing body high but I'm focused and happy at the same time like I would be if I were smoking a Sativa. I also have insomnia issues, so GP helps me get a decent night's sleep.”

“Nuggtastic! a definite fave of mine. Way too many awesome things to say about GDP. if u haven't tried yet so ASAP you'll be glad ya did!”
“Granddaddy Purp is the most powerful bud I have ever smoked I think. Lots of purple all thru the bud and hits very strong. One hitter. Gets you where you want to be fast.”

“realized today after having used this strain for 2 days into managing my PTSD that for the first time in over 30 years I can actually sit on the swing in my yard.... actually swing.... and not get motion sick!!! This is EPIC for me. maybe now i can go boating with my husband and not dread it.  .. i am so excited, there are no words.... more to follow in a few days on other reviews as i journey into The New Adventures...”

“Grandaddy purp knocked my socks off. Rolled up the windows in my car and prepared for a clambake. Took the first hit and about coughed up a lung. POTENT stuff, man. I only took about 3 or 4 more hits, and I was already feeling the effects. Certainly didn't creep up on me, I KNEW it was there. Already had munchies prepared, so my girlfriend and I sat in the car literally two hours talking about religion, family, and t...”
“Really interesting, fun high. Starts out rather energetic and morphs into a relaxed, smiley stone.  It's in my top 10.”

“Really like this strain mid evening. At first there's a rush of energy and then the high settles to a mellow stone. You're still fully functional.  it's one if the more amazing strains. We hardly ever see it around here. When it makes its way to town, I immediately buy a quarter. A little goes a long way but you can just keep smoking it and see where it takes you..I usually wind up saying I don't believe this"....Yo...”"

“I am very new to this.   I have suffered with back issues for 14 years.  I spent many of these years managing multiple level lumbar fusions with pain medications.  The opioids are not working so I stopped.   I have tried many different strains and I didn't feel any type of pain relief qualities until trying Gdp.  This strain is definitely something that could be used to treat back pain.   Very limited use can produce...”

“The effects of this one are strong but not extreme.  I get a very nice numbness to the cerebellum area of the brain.  Mild inner eye padding feelings as well.  Quite enjoyable stye with a clear mind but brain numb feeling.  I think this one will be good after work without being too couch lockish. To me, the effects of this one are clearer to distinguish versus most strains that give a variety of effects.  People with...”

This classic strain starts off with a relaxing head high that quickly spreads into a full body high. No special occasion needed to smoke this friendly and fruity bud. It's ideal for falling asleep or just chilling out on the couch, cannabis junkies would be wise to always keep this great granddad...”

“This strain has been a standby for me for about 15 years. I have found it to be very consistent from grower to grower and i can always rely on it to put me to sleep within about an hour. It may not be the most intense or interesting high but for a bed time med it is second to none. It is one of the only strains that sedate me without even a slight stimulating effect.”

“This is THAT ish. Yeah you know that Snoop Dogg R. Kelly song, that was about GDP. Fire 🔥 smell and taste, potent relaxing effects can be felt immediately but overall creeps up on you. Perfect for night time or a lazy afternoon Netflix session. Top 5 indica for sure!”
“Very intense high. Severe couch lock followed. Felt like I was riding a roller coaster while laying down. Best high I've ever had.”

“GDP is one of the few indicas I can take. Most are too heavy for my liking. This strain gives me a nice relaxed tingly buzz that lulls me into sleep. Not quite the deep body high of other indicas, but in general I like the GDP relaxing and calming effects much better than the stoney feeling. The bud is deep purple with a crazy amount of crystals. It's got a berry-like aroma with a sweet but earthy taste. Great for st...”

“This is THAT ish. Yeah you know that Snoop Dogg R. Kelly song, that was about GDP. Fire 🔥 smell and taste, potent relaxing effects can be felt immediately but overall creeps up on you. Perfect for night time or a lazy afternoon Netflix session. Top 5 indica for sure!”
“Picked up the U.S Cup winning GDP at Herbal Healing. Amazing berry taste very sweet and an extreme couch lock. If your looking to get the best GDP would say go there.”

“Ah, GDP, how I love you. You help me sleep soundly at night, you're delicious, and you make me feel fantastic. The aroma is that of grapes and hash, delicious. The aroma transitions to flavor decently, and is always one of my favorite smokes. The high is warm, with a heavy body buzz, and some tingling as well, but it tapers off into a deep slumber. Great for insomniacs such as myself. Also provides good pain relief.”
“Blown away by this strain. Smells almost like Sour D and taste like grape. High is cerebral at first then couch lock sinks in. Consistently sleep well with GDP”

“I purchased the vape oil for GDP on the recommendation of a friend, who suffers from insomnia. 
I was previously taking three medications to sleep and would still find myself waking up because of pain.
GDP got the job done with making me sleepy and managed to suppress my pain enough that I managed to sleep for longer than an hour or so.
The overall body high laziness made passing the fourteen kidney stones that I pas...”

“For one who deals with severe chronic pain on a daily basis, GDP has been a literal Godsend. I've got a rare form of muscular dystrophy that atrophies the muscles in my back, hips and thighs. column3: “This strain is crazy I had a it in a wax pen and the flavor is like nothing I’ve ever tasted. I took about 4 hits and I waited about 5 min and I didn’t feel anything so I waited another five minutes and bam it hit me like a bus. This high is insane would not recommend for day time use it’s a great night time high.”

“My first review of this strain a month ago wasn't fair.  I shared about a gram with friends.  This time I rocked a bowl by my lonesome and wow!!!  Heavy couch lock heavy munchies very bad stoned eyes.  only partake late evening DO NOT RUIN IT FOR THE RESTOF US.  Do not smoke and drive.”

“Tried Grand Daddy Purple it had lots of trichomes and was dense. This batch had a lemony smell to it, had a real strong citrus aroma. In the light the purple that should come with this strain was in there. The high for me was heady and then move towards my body making me relax. Definitely reccomend this strain for going to sleep or just chilling at home.”
“Very unique and relaxing high, no paranoia or something and for me bursts of creativity, combine it with some sativa and you'll get your things done. Sleeping is amazing with this strain”
“That GDP!" is what was said to me and my group of friends when sold the famous Californian kush. I still remember the smell
column4: the look
column5: and the first smoke of GDP just two years ago. That eighth destroyed all standards of everything we smoked prior and referred as "dank as hell." Granddaddy Purple made me care about what strains I smoked! From the sweet taste to the roaring imagination
column6: Granddaddy purple is one for t...”"

column3: “My go to for before bed; helps eliminate my usual sleep paralysis before falling asleep. Love the sedative effects in both mind and body.”
“This shit was fire. Had me feeling like I was part of a feel-good drama movie 😂😂 Lit 👌🏼”
“Night time relaxation”
“I loved it! Very relaxing but not enough to knock me out. I have crps and  I felt immediate pain relief, plus it’s great for anxiety. Was always excited to try it and I wasn’t disappointed at all.”
“I loved it! Very relaxing but not enough to knock me out. I have crps and  I felt immediate pain relief, plus it’s great for anxiety. Was always excited to try it and I wasn’t disappointed at all.”
“This strain is perfect to end the day like a rockstar and go to sleep fully relaxed.”
“By far my favorite strain I’ve tried so far. Very sedative for sure. One for bedtime. Would totally recommend for anyone with trouble sleeping. Have had the best sleep of my life with this stuff.”
“My absolute favorite bud to look at, and most wonderful to smoke. Fruity pungent aroma with a tropical effect euphoric. Love this bud quadruple thumbs up to this one.”
“It tasted like the colour Purple, if that even make's any sense. This particular strain is very good.”
“Awesome product, the smoke is very smooth not harsh at all.  The smell is very aromatic and welcoming.  Would recommend!”

“GDP was one of my first strains and definitely one of my favs. This will have you on couch lock. Recommend this when you have nothing to do, because you will get nothing done if you smoke this strain”
“So so smooth. Very gentle onset, very progressive. Just a nice pleasant high. Made me want to cook all night.”
“I love coming to Arizona organix. There purple flowers are the best I highly recommend you guys come here!”
“Classic grape taste with bud color to match. Get you high as a giraffes ass.”
“pruple af”

“A wonderfully aromatic indica. This strain is on the heavier stoney/sleepy side. But, I'd say veteran smokers may be able to fight the sedation if you're planning on enjoying more than a few tokes. This is a great indica with stony effects, delicious taste, and berry smell. It's a great strain to fight insomnia & pain. I definitely recommend it if you enjoy delicious & wonderfully aromatic strains. The flower I picke...”
“Helps you sleep”
“Brought this to a get together, made a couple bowls and passed it around. Everyone who hit it was couch locked. But we all still had an amazing time. Definitely would recommend.”
“By far my favorite strain in the WORLD!”
“Awesome flavor, gets the job done and doesn't waste any time doing so Ha. the buds looked great!”
“Awesome flavor, gets the job done and doesn't waste any time doing so Ha. the buds looked great!”

“This is my first time trying this strain. This is without question my favorite indica. Went for a long trail ride on my bike with some NYC Sour Diesel and immediately packed a bowl of GDP when I got home to decompress and relax and it did just that. This strain is great for a post workout and to wind down from a stressful day at work. Very comfortable and very lazy. SUPER HUNGRY as well. This is perfect for sleeping ...”
“this stuff put me to sleep. took a 1 hour nap lol   good body/mental high. makes you mellow out”

“GDP is always a pretty solid strain with always having a great flavor in both flower and concentrate. Has a deep berry taste, more earthy, and not as sweet as say BD.  Great medication for pain and just relaxing after a hard day of hiking (or hangovers).”

“The taste of this strain is smooth and fruity . Effects take hold quickly and last long. My wife and I both suffer back problems and this strain really help ease the pain down and she suffers from insomnia and it helps her to sleep . This is in our top 10 list of favorite strains to buy . We love Granddaddy Purple .”
“my absolute favorite strain⛽⛽⛽🔥🔥🔥”
“Fantastic Indica. There's a reason it has been so popular for so long. Great body high but won't have you sleeping an hour in. Feels very light and clean for a body-bud.”
“smokin it rn and mad relaxed”
“smokin it rn and mad relaxed”
“wow only smoke this if you have time to kill not the best strain to smoke if you have to go out”
“All I can say is wow. Top 3 Indicas. So fucking nice!!!”"
“Like a Monét, perfection...”

“Had a grape exhale which was kind of neat. The high hit fast. When the initial rush wears off, then you relax quite a bit and feel a smidge lazy... but easily entertained. Not super euphoric and the initial come on is a little intense (but no post-anxiety), otherwise I would give it a 5.”
“Idk but it didn't make me sleepy or anything it gives me more of a sativa high”
“It's amazing. Very chilled relaxing smooth and clean. Helped me get energetic and get alot done”
“this one was a sneaky creeper. Very nice easy high, and I am still going up. Clean tasting, and gentle to those around you that may not like the scent.”
“love granddaddy purple before bed. GREAT body relaxation and my head just sinks in the pillow”
“Great for lower back pain and has a great taste.”
“Really relaxing. Lots of munchies. Relieves body pain. Very enjoyable and gives a fun cerebral buzz without any anxiety or paranoia. Good evening wind down indica”

“I am totally convinced that this is one of the strongest indica strains out there. Very powerful, and tasty! Love the way it makes me feel, but only take a few because it will put me to sleep. One of the best!”
“This strain is godly. It makes me feel just so right. Relaxes me so well. Listening to music with this is bomb. Amazing nights rest after smoking this.”
“Really sweet fruity taste, really potent🙏🏽”
“smoked this at a gathering with all my close friends and i! it genuinely made us all feel like we were closer ! highly recommend”
“my favorite strain”
“Here comes Granddad to read you a bedtime story...ABOUT SMOKING THAT PURP! Love it. Easy A from the Professor.”
“best strain so far for me. It makes me happy and relaxed. I sleep well.”

“Granddaddy Purple -

Lip permeating, moist and fruity with light, earthy after tones on the palate. Relaxing, airy and slightly sedating to the body, anxiolytic, even in low doses.

Good to take your time on this one, very tasty.”

“One of the best strains I have found for generalized anxiety.  I keep dosing mild to moderate (2 to 8 hits spacing 10 to 15 minutes apart; I use a vape cartridge).  It does have a higher THC content than most high CBD strains used for anxiety, but I find that there is no paranoia or anxiety for me with this strain.  A heavy session will produce a nice high, but I find the come down a little rough.”
“Very nice sleepy high.”
“One of all time favorite strains give a nice relaxing hi love that the buds are actually purple oh and it gets me horny lol”
“Great strain for when your muscle are sore”
“You feel beyond relaxed instantly🌞 The gangna gods have blessed this weed with amazing powers that is worth all of your money🌻”
“it's a great strain for sleep it will couch lock you after a nice bowl 2 bowls I was K.O.”

“GDP will definitely knock any motivation out of you. It leaves you completely bound to wherever you smoked it. Smoking it (and the high that accompanied it) was very pleasant and almost surreal. I notived that music is amazing while high on GDP.
However, it tends to make me really paranoid and the munchies are strong in this one!”
“One of my top favorite indica's out there! With its sweet grape and berry taste followed by a great all over body sedation, it is a 5 star strain for sure!”
“great for restlessness and insomnia and hunger and a little on pain.”
“Beautiful bud, one of the best indicas I have smoked. Awesome head high and had me laughing for no reason 😂.”

“Got this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA. See pictures and detailed reviews on my blog the  Aging Ent's Tastings -- Brand: Dama
Strain: Grand Daddy Purple
Indica-dominant Hybrid
--Potency Analysis: TTL 22% THC 0% CBD 0% THCa 22%
Cost: $15/gram --
I have to start this talking about the packaging from dama brands...  It's packed in nitrogen to keep it fresh.  The box is very big, and full of a ton of info.  -- This is that...”
“Had the concentrate of this strain and my God. It tasted like grapes and love. the high took a minute to kick in but once it was there I was soaring.”
“I don't usually comment on weed...but this one deserved it! It was by far the most spirituality uplifting Night I've had in my entire life (kush was🔥)”
“Had the concentrate of this strain and my God. It tasted like grapes and love. the high took a minute to kick in but once it was there I was soaring.”
“I don't usually comment on weed...but this one deserved it! It was by far the most spirituality uplifting Night I've had in my entire life (kush was🔥)”
“I love it”
“Absolutely Amazing. Best sleep ever”

“this has become my daily go to. so relaxing, keeps me out of my head, i van get tired if i just lay on the couch but if i stay busy it helps me to be pretty productive. sex is amazing! makes me frisky but not uncontrollably. definetly reccomend.”

“I'm not a big fan of indica, but this was a pretty damn good strain. Mine wasn't very purple, but that's no big deal. This strain made me feel tingly like my body was pulsing in a very cozy and relaxing way. It also made me feel very relaxed, a little sleepy but not like Platinum Kush, and happy. I wouldn't call this a super strong strain, or at least mine wasn't, but it's very enjoyable. It was either this strain or...”

“I just tried this strain for the first time, and I liked it a lot! It has a nice sweet berry smell to it. I think Leafly has it right, I experienced cerebral euphoria and physical relaxation." GDP is much better than a lot of indicas
column4: that just make me tired. Ultimately
column5: I was pleasantly surprised by this stain and I'll definitely get it again!”"

column3: “Actually, it IS available here. Just ask around. Anyway, I really enjoyed the high that I got from this strain. I did however, find it to be not very long lasting.”
“this got me high as shit and i feel like im floating and its a strong high”
“This is a beautiful strain good for PTSD and stimulates appetite It burns me out so good for sleep lol this strain is grand”
“Def a Fav of mine, nice and heady for my screaming migraines!!!”
“Ideal indica strand. Great for aiding pain, sleep, and appetite.”
“Great pain and stress reliever. More of a nighttime strain though.”
“Takes a while to hit, but I was good after one skimp blunt. Tastes great too!”
“Took the stress of the Holidays away!!  Great strain, looking forward to using it at every family function lol.”
“Relaxing”

“All Hail to the King!!! You're not a real smoke until you've had this!!! beautiful purple hair throughout. Strong, pungent Berry/ grape scent and flavor. I thought I would never see this. Had to call and get more just as a keepsake. This is on the top of my list right now as a favorite!”
“It's very good flower completely purple nice in a blunt with wax smoked a blunt with wax and GDP today and about to go to sleep”
“love it!!! dense buds grind up quite nice. the taste and smell makes my salivate. definitely just lifted my mood in a serious time of need. in my top 5”
“night night”

“This has to be one of my favourite strains. I usually have to be careful with what strains I smoke due to getting paranoid easily but not once have I gotten paranoid from smoking this. It gives me a nice relaxing feeling in my body and mind. It’s not a strain where I’m just laying on the couch for hours. It gives me a uplifting effect so I can still go on with my day and still be productive.”
“Shit puts me down”
“Getting really high with this strain forces me to meditate.”
“this is by far my favorite strain if weed I've ever smoked”

“It tastes proper purple and berry like, bit earthy but overall sweet. The stone starts and I felt happy and euphoric within minutes. After that the Indica effects begin, good for stimulating appetite and getting a good nights sleep!”
“Great potent Indica. Zero anxiety for me with this one. Nice and relaxed body also and a mellow mind. Even made me pull out my art supplies and sketch a litlte. Two thumbs up.”

“I love this strain this strain is the best indica. It is a very potent smoke and the exhale is the best weed I have ever had great strain to have pain and the best even with a bud and you might end up fucking baked on this strain.
The first time I've smoked this strain from the strain I was lucky enough to get a big of course but this one was pretty much we did that I took it in a joint. I was hoping for anything tha...”

“A classic. One of my favorite all time strains. Heavy Indica, instant sleepy effect. Classic indo taste and burn, very full flavor. Perfect thick smoke. Its great for before bed, or to mix with a sativa go balance out a high.”
“Loved this strain for many years, great flavor, awesome for pain”
“smoked on this strain the other day absoulte beauty smelled real sweet and that purps was amaxing reminiscing some cookies”
“great for my insomnia”
“Personally this is one of my favorites yo. It's really good for a midnight toke before bed!”
“Personally this is one of my favorites yo. It's really good for a midnight toke before bed!”
“Rocks my world”
“amazing night time dab to relieve pain and put you to sleep not to soon after if you don't litterly keep moving 🤣🖒”
“great strain if u wanna get knocked out”
“This is a classic, absolutely love this strain gets me so faded!”
“A very peaceful high relaxing good way to loose some anxiety or stress. Kick back wach a good movie or just passout”
“potent to the max, had me not wanting to move at all an talk about a high that lasts I still felt if 12+ hrs after smoking 2 bowls with friends!”

“Goodnight I'll talk to you in the morning. Damn this flower is potent, tasty, and gets you stoned! Definitely a favorite of mine especially when I'm looking to chill and pass out. Not a good choice for mornings but if you don't have anything pressing to do smoke this beauty all day.”
“potent to the max, had me not wanting to move at all an talk about a high that lasts I still felt if 12+ hrs after smoking 2 bowls with friends!”

“Goodnight I'll talk to you in the morning. Damn this flower is potent, tasty, and gets you stoned! Definitely a favorite of mine especially when I'm looking to chill and pass out. Not a good choice for mornings but if you don't have anything pressing to do smoke this beauty all day.”
“Wonderful strain. My go-to medicine when it comes to falling asleep!”

“After the newest strain grown for me, that  I could not wait to taste is Granddaddy Purple an Indica hybrid of Purple Urkel and Big Bud.  I see the Big Bud right away in my last visit to the Grow.  Huge cola buds and middle level huge tract buds as well.  Tonnes of stingy Orange pistil hairs and an intriguing Pine and Tree fruit odours on the live plants.

This is one hell of a great pain killing and sedative strain....”

“One of my all time faves. 
Never disappoints. 
Tastes awesome. 
You relaxed and chill.”
“fire”
“i was messed up for the whole day when i smoked a dubs worth with a friend. shit made me cough so hard though and i didn't wanna do shit”
“the most delicious aroma. I don't even want to smoke it just horde it in mason jars & smell it. when its burned I feel like I should tip my dealer. amazing strain!”
“Great smoke, perfect mood.”
“I think this is proper.  What else could I say this is old school. Burns well and last a long time for friends to enjoy. This is killer weed.”
“Amaze balls”

“This strain is perfect for those who suffer from severe pain, insomnia, lack of appetite, nerve issues and general crappy feelings. This beast is in a class of its own!

I have used this strain for the past 2 months in the form of Shatter and Brittle. The CBDA levels are through the roof. 

A moderate dose always allows me to punch on through the day. A heavy dose will leave you happy, hungry and sleepy.  Enjoy!!!”

“By far my favorite Indica strain. It made my body feel very relaxed and it also made me feel very uplifted too. It's great for just chilling out, and for helping me sleep. As far as the taste/smell, it smells like grape after you smoke it, and it tastes pretty sweet.”

“This was exactly what I needed for my sleep problems. Another person wrote it takes a little time to kick in which is true. Definitely maybe 10 to 15 minutes and then you basically fall sleep on the sofa.  It’s pretty strong and long lasting and it really helps you to have a good night sleep.”
“smells and tastes incredible. breaks down and feels great. classic strain that is super dope for a chill time alone or with friends.”
“maybe the best I've smoked in AZ, purple stinky eewy gooy”
“smells and tastes incredible. breaks down and feels great. classic strain that is super dope for a chill time alone or with friends.”
“maybe the best I've smoked in AZ, purple stinky eewy gooy”

“This strain is perfect for insomnia. Took a couple hits of a GDP vape cart and was knocked out within minutes. I wish I could comment on the “head space” or the overall feeling of this strain, but honestly, I fell asleep to quickly to reap any of those benefits, haha.”
“A really solid Indica stone without too much sleepiness. Definitely a good strain for the evening hours however.”
“one of my favorites great taste and stone”
“Does the job for insomnia, and I like the taste.”
“awesome”
“amazing helped with my anxious legs”
“amazing helped with my anxious legs”
“Perfect for chronic insomnia and stress. Leaves one feeling tranquilized and euphoric. Favorite”
“some of the best smoke I've ever had”
“I really don't care for the old guy.”

“One of my favorites, it has a very sweet grape smell. Breaking apart the nuggs left a lot of crystals on my fingers, recommended using a grinder if possible. Incredible head high! Purple patches are noticeable with many crystals.”

“Smoking GDP gave me Forrest Whittaker eye. I usually smoke hybrids and Sativas so this hit me like a brick shit house. A melting sensation over my whole body and a strong, clear head buzz both paralysing and relaxing. 

The aroma is sweet and berry-dominant, same with the smoke. The best tasting strain I've come across to date.”
“really good high. only problem is that it doesn't last to long. but still tasty and worth trying”

“Tried this strain as apart of the Lilavex flower. I made canna butter with this strain.  The berry flavor adds an unique sweetness to stews, brownies and others sauces ( scampi, pasta sauce)
As an edible, the effects are felt with 2 hours lasting up to 6 hours.  The effect- face and head tingles , then a sense of lightness. Stress thoughts roll away. Euphoria then sexual stimulation. Within no time couch lock then 😴...”
“First time ever smoking this got me extremely high. I would definitely buy this again”
“Frosty purple dankness! Best bud hands down 🙌”

“G.D.P. is a heavy indica with a slight grape(purple) aftertaste. Fairly dense and slightly triched, the stone is very pressured around the face and the neck with mid level pain-numbing effects. If you are a fan of PURPS this is a must try.”

“If the color Purple has a taste, This is it!

Looks like fine jewelry, feels like velvet.”
“as someone with anxiety, a few puffs of this makes me so relaxed.”
“This strain hits hard but has a gentle ride.  Fast to relax. Great for insomnia.”
“Big punch, little goes a long way. Very mellow high, also tastes sooo good.”

“Good for stress and to have a good time with friends or just listen to music and have a relax night. It does gives u the munchies and i was laughin like crazy. I was a little bit dizzy but that was the only negative. Great flavor!”
“Sleepy”

“I was diagnosed with bipolar disorder back in 09 and have been through just about all the medications that are available with little to no relief. Anyway, today I have been suffering from anxiety and mania. This is my first time using medical marijuana. I said a quick prayer and asked God to make this medication work the way that it needs to work and it did. I felt slightly dizzy at first and slightly paranoid, which...”
“Amazing mellow high, great pain relief, outstanding insomnia relief. A top 5 strain”

“Just purchased an ounce of GDP and it’s definitely a creeper strain! Love the heavy indica effect of it!2/4 of my friends are out on their ass after 3 small bowls, hands down one of my favorite strains of all time.”

“A definite creeper but provides a relatively strong body high.  Very smooth when vaping with no coughing at all.
Tasted slightly earthy but sweet too.  Regarding flavor, the first thing that comes to my mind is a Tootsie Roll or 
a Cheeba Chew.  Didn't feel much for the first 30 minutes or so and then BOOM, it really set in.  Felt tingly and super relaxed.  Relatively clear headed high and somewhat couch locked.  Fel...”
“Big dense buds that have a long burn when hand picked apart. Giggly and heavy.”
“super stoned 👲”

“GDP saved my life.  Or at least induced a melt into the mattress/where does my body end state, to allow me to sleep for the first time in a week.  This is what medical marijuana should do.  I vape this often before sleep, and find myself in a euphoric mind/body high which keeps getting deeper for thirty minutes before leveling off to a nice relaxed body high. Sort of a relax your mind, your body will follow process. ...”
“A smooth and subtle journey. Not as strong as pain reliever as others, but it gets the job done. Also doesn't seem to have the staying power for relief as some other indicas.”
“Had this 3 timed in 2 days.. good shit”
“I have horrible tendonitis in my shoulder...one puff pain gone hallelujah purple urkel..lol”
“Give you a intense high. You feel chilled and relaxed. The smoke is pretty heavy and taste good.”

“Awesome! Use indica shatter to augment RSO and flower at night and picked up some GDP and GrampaBear is impressed to say the least. Great for pain, sleep, stress...and I turned the heat down to let those turpines come through first...sweet wine drips down your throat! Bursts of berries explode! And then you crank it up and the CBD and THC starts hitting your brain and spreading through your body...say hello to GDP! Y...”
“gets the job done for pain relief,do get tired if to much smoked.”
“Heart raced, mind raced, first time user in years. Slept hard.”
“Heart raced, mind raced, first time user in years. Slept hard.”
“smoked this heavy in 11th grade, put me to sleep. Only smoke if your chilling for the day”
“Very relaxing. Helps me mainly with stress and I get the munchies like crazy with this one. Really can’t go wrong 🤙🏻”
“This is a go to nightime strain for me.  Nice euphoric high, and does quite well for my pain and insomnia.  Lots of indica body high, but not a couch lock.  Great strain!”

“Tried this strain after hearing about the hype. to be honest it was the worst weed i have ever smoked (And i rarely find strains i don't like). First it tasted horrible, second the high was not enjoyable, and last but not least the high was short.”
“Experienced the best high of my life with this.”
“beautiful buds. great taste. a good buzz.”

“I am a HUGE fan of ALL of the Purple Kingdom but, for me, they are like hitting a nail into a wall with a sledgehammer. They are, as are most pure indica strains for me, mostly a body high. They are great if you want to eat everything in the refrigerator and then go to sleep. But I like to be able to think and do things. This one has an undeniably delicious fruity smell and flavor. But I get nothing done. Zilch. Nada...”

“Excellent indica that was very popular in the area I grew up in during the 2000s. The gdp I've had after 2011 seems like its been watered down but I probly just haven't been able to get a hold of that original dank cut since then ( kind of like with sour d). Dank skunky grapes is how I remembered it. More recent gdp I've had has been lighter scented more musky perfumey grape. Heavy indica. I like gdp.”

“Great sweet grape taste and smell. Great after a hard days work. Nice relaxing body effect. Not harsh very smooth tasty grape vapor. Very happy with this strain and recommend for appetite and sleep and relaxing away stress. A Grade Tested.”
“nice! purple is the color, but not strongest effects!”
“amazing!”

“Me and My friends got this for the last 420, i must say after about 7 mins and a bit of walking i was completely G O N E.  Like no control over anything i did, Made me happy and feel epic"  if anyone wants bud that makes them feel epic then this is your stuff.  The "peak" lasts about 4 mins and comes on in a moderate amount of time.  Great bud for afternoon high.”"
“dvefbd”

“Good taste, good quality where I got it from so good look, good smell... great smoke. Caused me to be very well medicated. Worked great on my nerve pain. My pain which usually is a 5 or 6 became a distant and forgotten 1 out of 10; 10 being the worst. If you get the chance, give this a try.”
“This is a Highly Sedative High.. Don't expect to do anything after smoking this.. unless you plan on sitting in one spot..”
“This is a Highly Sedative High.. Don't expect to do anything after smoking this.. unless you plan on sitting in one spot..”
“I love the shite out of this strain. My anxiety is wicked and GDP is my go to to calm down and shut my brain off. Really “good vibe” strain for sure 👌🏼”
“I really like this strain at bedtime.  It helps my muscle spasms and pain as much as the next strain, but the sleepiness it gives is a rival to Blackberry.”
“The GDP i had didnt seem to strong but i loved the taste. it tasted exactly like fruity pebbles.”
“from sdfinest...weak batch...ok medicine”
“My go to strain to calm my anxieties and stress.”

“Granddaddy is so overlooked sometimes because of the fact that it is everywhere. But the truth is it is one of the best strains ive ever smoked. I am more of a true sativa head high lover but GDP at night especially if you rip it from a bong. Say goodnight because you will ptfo and it will be amazing.”

“Granddaddy is so overlooked sometimes because of the fact that it is everywhere. But the truth is it is one of the best strains ive ever smoked. I am more of a true sativa head high lover but GDP at night especially if you rip it from a bong. Say goodnight because you will ptfo.”
“its good shit”

“One of my favorite strains, definitely a lazy strain. Smoke it with some of your friends, makes the experience 10x better. Don't have that crazy dude though that relives his childhood. Especially if he's russian.


Happy Schmokin'”

“I've had this strain in mind for a while since I took an Indica strain test on here and matched with GDP. When I bought it I wasn't really expecting much besides melting in the couch, and that's what I got. This strain has a berry aroma to it and when you smoke it and exhale you really taste the grape-ness of it and instantly feel it's couch lock effect. When I tried to get up, my head went straight back to my pillow...”

“It started off numbing my legs and relaxing me, now about 20-30 minutes in i feel pressure behind my nose and in eyes. It is a pretty nice strain honestly and i am a regular smoker who has tried over 30 medical marijuana strains and i have had my license since january. It is a pretty nice bud cant really go wrong with this one.”
“DANK”

“Beyond relaxed. My pain level went from 8 to 3. My eyes felt like there were weights on them. Pretty clear head, but couldn't move even if you'd paid me to. Which is good because I'd have eaten all the food if I could've gotten up to get it. Full body feeling.
BTW I dunno if it's because it's 250mg, but even on lowest heat setting it tastes like burnt dirt. 😖”
“This strain makes me giggly and silly.”
“A legendary strain for a reason. Very powerful psychedelic and I will be ordering this again. Keeps the body relaxed and the mind on a peaceful exotic journey”
“Currently vaping in an oil cartridge, Feeling sleepy and calm.  The flavor however is a refreshing grape that is tastier than any mary i've tried prior.  Holds its own as one of the best.”
“This is my GO TO for kicking back watching a movie and helps me sleep without waking up throughout the night I call it my sleepy time smoke. LOVE IT”
“This one is a keeper and go to for unwinding relieving lots of stress n anxiety yet still keep a clear head for work!”

“Not only having beautiful genetics this strains really has been around for a long time, I can always remember this strain smelling wonderful like Welch's grape juice or grape Kool-Aid. This strain not only tastes just like it smells but has an amazing stoney high that can leave users cough locked. If you can get your hands on any GDP I would cherish this strain until it's gone.”

“By Apothecary Genetics, old school, have been fine tuning this strain for more than 5 years,where the strain has been known by many different names including Grape Ape, Purple Erkel, and Grandaddy Grape Ape
Seems if grown in cooler climates 60-67F she gets darker and darker and attracts bugs more than average too
Growing Granddaddy Purple made me nervous as I kept thinking the purple was the sap locking up in the lea...”
“I can't do  stativas so this strain is my daily go to.”
“At the moment this is my favorite strain. One bowl pack got me ripped. Very strong and potent but very harsh.”
“for me i love this strain wakes me right up in the morning and keeps me going through the day which is weird cause its indica i have gdp before and they look and smell similar but yeah”
“My favorite strain by far, it does wonders for anxiety and insomnia. GDP is a nighttime necessity, and always delivers an amazing high no matter how you smoke it.”

“After smoking disposable vapes with Purple Candy I thought I would stay in the wheelhouse of purpleness. Purple Candy is the wannabe. Granddaddy just outright rocks. For anxiety, sleep, pain or if you just want to outright relax and become one with the couch, this is it. This. Is. It.”
“It is wonderful sweet grapy and very berryful love this strain but I can't never get it no more here any Georgians on here lol”

“GDP is a beautiful strain. Everything about is true. GDP's great to build an appetite, treat anxiety & muscular tension. I personally consume GDP to help me be calm, cool, and collective for work related stress to tense work out sessions. GDP got the goods to help relieve. I'm naturally up and about, so Sativa can be too much for me, but this Indica is just right to keep me grounded. I feel like GDP could also help k...”

“Since I'm a bit new to the exploding world of cannabis, I have to say I had a remarkable first experience!  I've been dealing with insomnia due to chronic pain for several years, along with depression and anxiety. I haven't slept a full 6, 7 or 8 hours since 2010...I know you can probably relate!  So, I had a visit with Nathan at The GreenHouse in Glendale, AZ. He was a plethora of information after I explained my li...”
“Best shit if you have anxiety!!! Best Shit ever!!!! 420”
“Excellent Indica for sleep.  It tends to give me the munchies so I avoid it until bedtime.  Highly recommend if you are looking to relax quickly and get some sleep.”

“Woke up at 3:30am with a headache. I get terrible migraines, complete with nausea and puking. This didn’t make my headache be at its peak and make its way down when I normally medicate, but just all of a sudden it was gone. I can see how this would be great for joint pains also. Arms are feeling very loose. Feel very carefree and serene. My 4 year old decided to climb in bed with my husband and I a few minutes ago, I...”

“Like Grape App Gran Daddy Purple (GDP) is one of my go to Sleepy Time Indicas. It's got a great flavor profile, great body and head buzz, while helping you relax and unwind. Great for insomnia, anxiety, and just relaxing.”

“Of course if grown correctly this strain is amazing. Had some last night and it was great. Relieved my pain, eased my mind, and calmed me down so I could go to bed. This has been the best nighttime strain.”
“Mine was awesome great for pain indica to core its the taste that comes thru in cherry pie  strain was all purple freaking freight train love it highly recommend”
“Everything it's just that perfect high!”
“Smoked for insomnia, didn't help with insomnia. This strain made me paranoid while causing me to be slightly more tired than normal. Not a great combination..”
“This was a great strain with a great price it was smooth and tasted fantastic I would highly recommend to the veteran pot head”
“This is the best indica i have had so far, usually indicas just male me sleepy but i wasnt very sleepy with this. It made me feel like my body was floating.”

“I have tried a lot of grape strains for example Grape Ape purple Urkle Purple Kush pretty much anything that had purple in it and I'm not much of a Sweet Berry kind of guy. but of course they came up with a great cross with purple Urkle and crossed it with big bud switch Bowser high in potency and now the THC is always around 20% and it's great for an Indica medicinal high!”
“This is the best indica i have had so far, usually indicas just male me sleepy but i wasnt very sleepy with this. It made me feel like my body was floating.”

“I have tried a lot of grape strains for example Grape Ape purple Urkle Purple Kush pretty much anything that had purple in it and I'm not much of a Sweet Berry kind of guy. but of course they came up with a great cross with purple Urkle and crossed it with big bud switch Bowser high in potency and now the THC is always around 20% and it's great for an Indica medicinal high!”

“I have been a person who suffers from anxiety and depression since I was younger due to family and some personal problems this train right here has made me happy beyond belief I am not a major smoking but just a couple of hits is good enough for me to relax and enjoy a good movie or some tunes of any kind”
“vape Extract is 79% THC. Once you go Purple you never go back!”

“GDP provides with a very mellow high.  Still able to get things done but kills anxiety nicely.  I typically use GDP before bed it removes my restless leg in bed and makes late night comedy even better.”
“This is one of my favorite strain of all time it dose the job it puts me to sleep every time I smoke it”

“Not a giant Indica fan but this is GOOD. 
Nice nighty night strain and coupled with some cbd you are going NOWHERE fast. 
By it's self.. first time or light users should watch out how hard they roast themselves with it, a one position coma for a few hours, covered in slobber might occur. 
It just might give my fave heavy indica strain a run for it's money for the heavy indica punch it delivers.”

“The first I smoked / vaped as an MMJ patient. Still looking, but all my absolute favorites have GDP in the lineage! Some things are classic for a reason. GDP is almost always my last resort (cuz I cherish it) & never fails!”
“Makes me really hungry but other than that it's a pretty smooth indica - doesn't knock you out like others.”

“Best strain I’ve ever had .. before that it was blueberry headband .. but to me this tops it .. I have (acute) insomnia .. and this puts me to sleep waiting 15-20 minutes .. harder to search for strains that are legitimate in the uk .. so I’m lucky to have finally come across this beautiful strain! <3”
“This strain lives up to its popularity. It's a great body high.”

“This is my review for Bang's Cannabis washington i 502 producer version of the GDP.    The buds are lime green with a purple tint and heavily frosted in crystal.  After breaking up in the grinder the flower has a light floral or what i call a purple smell.  The smoke out of the bong is smooth and sweet with a light flavor in the mouth of the classic granddaddy flavor.  High 7/10 nice relaxed high mostly a body high w...”
“If you are a sativa smoker, be cautious. the sedating effect felt is something of myths. ALL TIME FAVORITE.”
“Best smelling bud I've tried and tastes great. Good for insomnia”

“OH GDP What to say  that hasnt been said already? Not much Im sure, with the purple buds looking like a draped out dirty south pimp, dense nugs and bright orange pistils, Granddaddy Purp is truly a on lasting staple in the world. This flower has one of the more flavorful buds ive had, this one platinum delights and rare darkness #1, are so outstanding with a amazing sweet berry flavor. Truly something that is to reme...”

“If there's a better medicine to immediately sleep to, I haven't found it. Within seconds after just a few hits from a vape, I'm searching out the nearest horizontal object to lie on, hoping it's not the floor. There's no waiting around while you're euphoric or just chilling. Straight to nite-nite time. -cyf”

“I have tried this strain as a pre-roll and as a concentrate; and I was very satisfied with both. I never ended up with couch-lock, but definitely felt the high in my head and body both. It has a pungent aroma not made for being discreet. The strongest flavors" I've noticed from GDP are pine and diesel.”"
“Hands down my favourite flower. Me and the wife both enjoyed GDP at night. Good for a movie or video game. It gives a nice body tingle and carefree calming feeling.”
“1, 2, 3 knockout punch. From dreamy to relaxed then flat out K.O.'d! If you have insomnia, this strain is for you.”
“I love this strain! Makes me giggly, happy, and relaxed. It takes me back to the nostalgic times of when I first started lighting up. A+”
“this stran is now days a clasic breeders have done wonderfull things with this flower . this is now for one my favorite and for two my go to stran for the insomnia form my ptsd a true heavy indica.”
“Hella bomb!”
“A HUGE high, 1 or 2 hits I'm done.”
“dry mouth”
“dry mouth”
“Very sleepy. Start off with a very small hit.  Let it settle.”

“If you love indicas you MUST try this. I’ve always been a huge indica fan. I do love a good Sativa during the day, but indica has always been my go to. I’ve grown to love the ChemDawg family of hybrids over the first few months of my medical card. 
So GDP. I’ve heard about and wanted to get my hands on some for quite some time. Since FL is new to the industry dispensaries are pretty far apart which limits your option...”

“The only true purple bud my dog has ever had! It was a brilliant deep shade of royal purple and it stank! 

A powerful euphoria along with sweet sedation! Perfect for depression, insomnia, lack of appetite and more :)”
“The almighty GDP, the perfect indica.”
“nice taste good looks”
“Very nice strain.  Leaves you with no worries what so ever”
“Very relaxing, strong indica.”

“Very relaxing, strong indica.”
“Nice looking dense buds. Wonderful flavor heavy stone.”
“Delicious strain from Kind Meds!”

“This is a good strain, but the batch quality is key to unlocking Granddaddy's full potential! A good batch makes this a GREAT strain and a poor batch makes Granddaddy so/so.  It is highly potent by nature and is purple in smell more so than looks, but I like it. A good go-to indica for sure.”
“Nice looking dense buds. Wonderful flavor heavy stone.”
“Gold standard. Good night's sleep and the smell of a bushel of grapes. Delicious.”
“Amazing taste and strong relaxing effects.”
“I enjoyed GPD but I do not recommend this strain for day time use. I found it to taste similar to purple diesel just a lot stronger. Its a Beautiful Bud”
“Nice immediate hit of relaxation and happiness.”
“left me feeling that traditional stoned effect.”
“If you are a sativa smoker, be cautious. the sedating effect felt is something of myths. ALL TIME FAVORITE.”
“Great Indica for bedtime. Really relaxing!”
“Nice looking dense buds. Wonderful flavor heavy stone.”
“Nice immediate hit of relaxation and happiness.”

“GDP, this strain along with northern lights and blue berry kush is just one of the best indica strains ive ever enjoyed. great for stress and insomnia. the body high is warm and very enjoyable. u wont be disapointed at all”
“left me feeling that traditional stoned effect.”

“Gdp offers relaxation and good pain control while elevating the mood at the same time.  It's mildly euphoric and helps with anxiety.  This is a smooth smoke with a potent high that is immediate and continues to build for quite a while.  It's got staying power, too, a long-lasting high.”

“This strain really helps relieve some of my symptoms of PSTD.  To me I get a heavy sleepy and euphoric effect and I consume before bedtime.  This is another strain that helps my night terrors during the night and flashbacks during the day time.  Very relaxing, without the couch lock effect for me.  I have some concentrate that just is tasty as hell.”
“left me feeling that traditional stoned effect.”

“Gdp offers relaxation and good pain control while elevating the mood at the same time.  It's mildly euphoric and helps with anxiety.  This is a smooth smoke with a potent high that is immediate and continues to build for quite a while.  It's got staying power, too, a long-lasting high.”

“I believe Gdp helped dismiss a great deal of the motor skills activity within my mouth and jaw area from Tardive Dyskinesthia. It helped, along with CBD treatment bring my completely debilitating tongue movements under control. Good strain for those suffering from involuntary neurological  muscle movements and muscle spasms.”

“the flavor blew...i missed the grape" tone singers because the over all strain was sad. i was stoned yes...flavor was a lie!!! the company missed on this one. i honestly expected the flower taste which i generally enjoy. i felt lied to :( stone was excellent just the taste ruined the high for me and raised my anxiety over all.”"
“It's amazing. Very chilled relaxing smooth and clean. Helped me get energetic and get alot done”
“anxiety out.”
“It's amazing. Very chilled relaxing smooth and clean. Helped me get energetic and get alot done”
“anxiety out.”
“Very nice mellow high. Calming and soothing, it helps me slow down at the end of a crazy day.”

“I fuckin love this strain my favortie makes me feel so good and relaxed n such a pain reliever way better option then popping pills its smells so good and strong very strong smell n the more the purple the better the smell n color 🔥🔥🔥🔥”
“love the smell and taste. not much in the way of potency but makes up for it in taste.”

“So this is excellent cannabis.

I mean, holy shit this is great weed.  GDP is a fantastic choice for medical patients with body and mind conditions.  It offers the prospect of very effective relief if utilized properly.

“If you want to pass out 45 minutes after vaping, this strain is your rock star.”

“Does give a very strong body high and will make you feel exhausted quite fast. My first time with an Indica as far as I know and I didn't particularly like it. A high is a high but I guess Indicas aren't my thing. Smelt very strong of berries with a little bit of a sweetness to it which WAS nice. I didn't feel the hunger as much as other people did. A very nice strain if you are into indicas.”
“It's yummy”
“Oh, me likey. Cracking open the container you get a subtle berry aroma. Very pleasing. The THC content of my strain was around 23%. And man, that is a very nice 23%. It says to me, Oh
column4: you like that? How about tthhhhiiisssssss....?" More of a body high for me. When inhaling
column5: the flavor somehow becomes ... peppery? Spicy? Probably a new first choice strain.”"

column3: “Really happy.  Really relaxed.  Tastes good.  Smells good.”

“Is a very good strain. Relaxes you very much. Helps with pain also. Has a good taste.”
“I just rip the bong with some hits from this strain and god damn is just amazing man peace from SF”

“Brings me to back to 2009 when I really first started smoking. Gave it a 5 cause I love the indicas and on top of that it bright back a lot of memories. This will always be a favorite! I loved getting super baked and just trying hard to fight the feeling of going to sleep and then smoking again to intensify the high! Haha! 😁👌🏽”

“strong indica. amazing sweet, berry smell (if the grower doesnt clip it too early and lets it dry properly) smokes clean and tasty. body-lock effects. great for sleep and appetite. 

vapes great during the day at low-medium heat (in a pax). able to enjoy the heady effects of the cannabanoids this strain offers that are lost during combustion.”

“This is truly a strain to help you de-stress and forget about a bad or stressful day. My go to when life gets the best of you & you want to forget the worst day of your life. Definitely use at night to help put you in that deep sleep mode.”

“Very very sweet strain, you can smell the fruits and wonder to the max while you’re grinding it. It’s effects are euphoric and relieving. This combined with the aroma produce one of the most powerful strains I’ve ever sampled. This is a definite future strain for me”
“Great strain for an end of the day relaxation!”
“strong and sleepy”

“Very very sweet strain, you can smell the fruits and wonder to the max while you’re grinding it. It’s effects are euphoric and relieving. This combined with the aroma produce one of the most powerful strains I’ve ever sampled. This is a definite future strain for me”
