“I can't believe I didn't try this earlier. Ah... The phases I went through were great! Phases 1: right away the body drops. 2: I was Happy, giggling and just around happy. 3: get ready, the feeling just drops onto lazy sleepy feeling, get near bed! 4: goodnight world, pain is gone and off to bed. ZZZZZZZzzzzzzz.”

“Just a great old school stain. I use it for pain management and it works like a dream. Even with with high THC it doesn't seem to make me anxious, rather it relaxes my entire body when I need it most. So glad to reconnect with old school purps!!”

“My friend used to go on about this strain.. I didnt care for it. Its was ok but nothing special. Short lasting and mild for pain. I might have been spoiled by the Tangerine Dream I had before it. Cause Tangerine Dream is awesome.”

“I can't believe I didn't try this earlier. Ah... The phases I went through were great! “A strong & heavy body high. It starts at the head and moves down over the rest of the body, following through to the neck onto the rest of your body into a fully relaxed space around you for a heavy stoned couch lock 15 minutes into it. The benefits I could see it being used for medical are pain management and depression. It puts you into a head space where 'giving a shit' isn't important so don't look to finish any ...”

“If I could give this a 4.5 I would. This is really tremendous. My initial impression was that this was a really weak strain. That's only because my pen at the time was weak. I opened the wax and I just loaded it onto my segilei and I'm goners. But this also may be the most will enforcing couch lock I've ever had in my entire life. So that's why it gets the -.5.”
“nice! purple is the color, but not strongest effects!”
“my favorite”
“Takes awhile for effect to kick in”
“Super bomb for any occasion”

“I picked up some clear round caviar looking balls of solvent-less Wax/Crumble I usually just put it on tp of my bowls and smoke it together with right now Gorilla Glue #4" (Devastating) I decided to do 3 or 4 dabs of it out of my rig and I must say the method they used is wonderful because I took BB sized dabs all 4 times and it was very very smooth and hit me like a warm blanket as I slowly fell into relaxation and...”"
“It's like purple bud blessing from God”
“mobile Mary's GDP is bomb.”
“Not a huge indica guy after blue dream and Chernobyl. However, solid strain. If I drift back to the indica world I'll give  this beaut another toke.”
“good weed if u wanna chill and talk”

“One of my top 5 all time favourites. Extremely visually appealing! Buds were completely beautifully bright purple almost drowning out any green in sight. If you want to go to sleep get your hands on this strain, if you want to do anything during the day, don't. High is euphoric but body feels like it's melting into the couch or chair. Made me feel very heavy and sleepy to the point I want to crawl into bed! Amazing l...”
“Very sweet (grape) smell....It's an indica, yet doesn't leave your head feeling cloudy... the buds were pretty dense, and had some purple... good for anytime of the day”
“Awesome body relaxant. Great for the mind too. I stopped having headaches and haven't felt this relaxed. Stopped me from feeling like I was on the precipice of a seizure. Very good nights rest.”
“Amazing and relaxing”
“Yup”

“Big juicy buds with 5 star bag appeal. Wafting a cheesy, sweet-n-sour, candied grape odor and remarkable hash flavor. Novice beware, this is a heavy smoke with long lasing effects. Find your happy place and enjoy the day. A pool side favorite.”
“Relaxing. Heavy couchlock!”
“honestly who doesn't love some purps?!?!?!”

“This grand daddy purp is my fav strain I use to just like  sativa but after trying this I love indica people say when they smoke a indica they can't walk they want to sit down not me and I love hikes when high but if u don't want to be to heavy with a. Indica this is the strain for u”
“Relaxing pain reliever with a great taste. Always a great pick up when you can.”
“Perfect for sleeping. I always get nearly a perfect night sleep with this. Tastes great. Smells dank as f. Loved it.”
“Ironically it's good for both nighttime and daytime... Has its own unique scent and look...I catch myself staring at the buds for minutes at a time”

“Helps me with anxiety, I feel so relaxed and calm.. Super chill. I love that it helps me to fall asleep because my mind is always going and going. When I sleep it helps me feel like I've slept 50 hours. It doesn't matter if I only slept 3 hours, I'll wake up feeling like it was the best sleep ever. Love this strain”

“My nugs didnt really purple but they get me stoned as fuck 
Good night plant and taste is a 7 of 10”
“My favorite purpley" strain of all time. A real nice body high mixed with the spacey couch-lock everyone loves. Good grapey tastes with tropical fruit undertones. A must have in your stash :)”"

“One of my all time favorite strains. The buds are nice and fluffy, beautiful purple and orange wrapped all around. Tastes like it looks, has a sweet grape taste. The high is not an intense high whatsoever , very relaxed and good for pain relieve.”
“Another nice relaxing indica strain. This strain will drift you off to sleep if your just chillin. Stay active, or it'll lock you in place. Nice aroma not to harsh on the throat.”

“Very relaxed happy feel. Great for a muscle relaxer. Flowers are beautifully moist.”
“Very indica dominant strain. Sweet taste & smell. Great for late at night when you just want to relax.”
“This strain might just be my favorite. That sleepy high is what Gdp has a lot of and that's what I'm looking for. Great strain to sit back and relax and zone out.”
“such a nice mellow high.  it put me right to sleep.  I love this purple and green frosty bud. definitely pick up some GDP if you haven't yet!”
“the effects of this strain on me were euphoria, relaxed, happy, talkative and melted all stress, anxiety,and physical pain away. Also gives you a great night sleep with awesome dreams.”

“Definitely my favorite strain. A popular one, and therefore hard to come by at dispensaries due to popularity. Great purple taste, smooth smoke, perfect amount of munchies to eat dinner, and felt relaxed and creative. Definitely my go to for celebration, or if I need a huge pick me up to get me going. Anxiety was diminished, and I felt pleasant.”
“good stuff”
“very good”
“never fails one of my fav strains very good indica will have you slumped and feeling good thank you azorganix for an awesome strain.”
“love GDP, especially when one can't sleep at night.”
“Pretty weak strain for me. Mild chill effect.”

“A slow kicking indica.
For a good half hour, you feel like you smoked a placebo flower.
Really calm and relaxing.
Has a very fruity flavour.
Downside-you might sleep through your alarm😂”

“Sometimes the munchies get a little crazy, but this is strain is a blessing when it comes to sleeping for me. I take a few hits late at night if I'm having trouble and I'm happy, relaxed, and out like a light. I use a sleep tracker and on nights when I don't smoke at all it says it takes me around an hour or more to fall asleep. When I smoke this stuff, it says 5 minutes. And I wake up completely refreshed, without a...”
“I smoked a strong sativa before this and this one almost knocked me out. After I smoked it I felt so tired I just wanted to sleep.”

“Like this strain quite a bit.

Very relaxing body high perfect for after work. Doesn't make you too tired in moderate quantities (e.g. a bowl).  Able to maintain focus.

Moderate to high tac (21.6)”
“Very relaxing high, a bit euphoric, with a earthy taste”

“Oh man, I've been waiting to try this one and it's all I could've hoped for. The heavy body buzz without any dizziness or paranoia, along with the sweet/tasty flavor makes this a perfect strain for newbies, while also appealing to OG's (which I am far from). This one confirms for me that purps are just what I need.”
“Gives me uncontrollable giggles.”
“One of my all time favorites, live the purple color and the plant grows amazingly strong and stout! The flowers I had where purple and had a great taste definitely was flushed before cropping.”
“great for pain, I keep stocked up on this at all times for my chronic back and joint pain. also gives me a pretty good head high.”

“Great strain!! Totally calms me down and evens me out. Great evening strain, I usually get pretty sleepy about 2 or 3 hours after smoking. I suffer from anxiety, mood, and pain disorders, and GDP helps alleviate all of my symptoms. Keeps my moods even, my pain at bay, and prevents my muscle spasms too. And it smells amazing!! 🍓🍒”

“This strain acts like a very powerful indica, in my experience the high was very fun and I laughed a lot initially. However, the longer I got into the high (or if I smoked to much) I'd get extremely tired, typically a smoke session with this strain ended with me sleeping. Very relaxing! a little too much :)”

“You just can't go wrong with Grandaddy Purple. Purple is my favorite & the effects of this strain have always been really positive. I feel very laid back, and it helps my anxiety. (I suffer from bad anxiety so I usually find bud that can help with anxiety). I smoked straight grandaddy purple for about 2 weeks and it's helped me a lot, as someone with anxiety. Also been smoking blue diamond and on today's menu is bana...”
“Wicked body high. Perfect for easing my back pain. Didn't leave me as couch locked as I thought it would. I'd buy this again. Nature's Medicine Az with another win.”
“Kind of upset with this strain it wasn't that strong to me”

“Love this strain. It gets me in the zone mentally while keeping my composure on the outside. 

The body high is nice. It makes the head high both smooth and pleasant. I didn't really have any negatives to this one other than the known dry mouth, but nothing soda can't fix. 

Five outta five would recommend.”

“Definitely relaxed and can for sure taste the grape. But it's kept me awake. I got home from work around 11pm and it's now 5:40am. I'm tired but I can't sleep. I just want to go to Walmart and get a bunch of stuff to craft, but I'm also very tired.”
“It's weak and very mellow. Don't expect much out of this one. It is good, but meh."”"

“Although I had it in a 250ml O.pen Vape cartridge it still tasted great until the end, then I could really taste the thinnners. It was dreamy hazy still could do my work which is very physical all the while having the energy to do it all. I usually go through 500ml cartridges in 4 days this 250ml lasted almost 5 days very good in my opinion took away the pain while I worked and let me enjoy my music while doing it.”

“My favorite indica BY FAR. It takes a while to kick in though. 15 minutes after smoking a few bowls and no feeing whatsoever, I started to question whether or not this strain was really that good. But shortly after that it hit me like a freight train. Prepare to eat anything and everything in sight, followed by heavy couch lock and a great nights sleep.”
“Very mellow, definitely a true indica, I was still able to function although I'm a daily participant, others may find it a a bit strong but I prefer a melting the couch herb”

“The effects combine a mind and body with cerebral euphoria and a deep body relaxation.  So deep in fact, that my ears fell asleep. Like i lost my dog one day, l hit the Gdp a few times a completely forgot i had a dog until he showed back up a few da...”

“I really like this strain. I take it at night for chronic pain and it works great. Very relaxing and somewhat numbing. I use it in a vape and the taste is great. I've mixed it with Harlequin and had great results. Harlequin keeps me more mentally alert while enjoying the body high.”
“wonderfully elegant awe of happiness and serenity. This strain is amazing and the yield she produces will have you flabbergasted ~G~  #wwgrower #ismoker”

“I like GDP, when I start having PTSD issues, when it's available in my area, about 3-4 good pulls and about 7-10 minutes, then life becomes a bit more manageable. I like others, but this one is my favorite.”
“Not the best bud Ive ever smoked but definitely up in the top 10 and definitely a strain i will be returning to again.”

“GDP is my favorite! Everything about this bud is satisfying. Smell, Taste, High and medical benefits that come from GDP are outstanding. After 2 years or so, I finally found the perfect GDP. I'm going to keep that a secret though :)”
“dopest dope ive ever smoked”
“i had 3 rips from a bong. the taste and high is great. ill post another entry when i get higher”
“It gave a little buzz at first then hit hard. Awesome strain recomend it.”
“This strain gave me a mellow but very lazy high.  It made me feel warm and cozy, and numbed my pain down - but didn't remove it.”
“This is honestly some of the best stuff that I've smoked. The high is intense, and the bud is extremely dense, and very dark. I love it, and would recommend it to anybody.”
“very nice”

“Picked up an eighth of an ounce just yesterday, packed a bowl by myself and tested it out. Quite smooth smoke, and it has a great taste, yet it still hits really hard and the buzz is quite potent. Strong, satisfying and calming. The batch I got was quite kiefy/powdery and fun to smoke with friends. Don't smoke late at night unless you want to fall asleep!”
“First time trying this strain. First time (in a really long time) writing a review about something. I have to say: this thing is really good!.”

“This thing hits you off your as$. I got top shelf gdp 30% THC. And man... I had to sign up for this sight just because how effective this strain is. After one hit out of my waterfall bong I was out in like 30 minutes lol. The body high was amazing too, but I wish I had a cup of tea or coffee before so I could of enjoyed this high more.”

“wonderful indoor top shelf meds that will take care of pains,anxiety,insomnia,depression,nusea and so much more.two zero two six nine seven six three two eight to order.all meds are trimmed to perfection.”
“Instant effects. Uncanny ability to freestyle, even more so than that Blue Dream”
“This is my go to strain!”

“Migraine pain mild; nausea 7 when I medicated round 1930 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (must for me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner. Head high heavy like a sleeper. Don't expect to get much done after medicating wit dis one. Great for insomnia. High lasted over 3 hours which was very nice. Highly recommend for nighttime use for pain/nausea/insomnia! :-)”
“motivational, uplifting, good smell, good taste.”
“JRETE smokes this shit before he goes to bed. JRETE has amazing dreams & always wakes up with a smile on his face”
“Pretty creative high for me. Feels amazing.”
“Dankk”
“It was fantastic! The issues I have are completely dampened by Granddaddy Purple. Must try if you have the same symptoms. Cheers!”
“can someone say COUCH-LOCK! dont plan on driving/going anywhere”
“very potent, relaxing and satisfying.”
“I was still able to write my research paper, so it was a good way to chill on a Sunday night. Take a hit and right after drink water, you will get a skittle candy taste.”

“Fantastic high. I recommend taking near the end of your day or when you are done going out.  I started over heating in a phone store and started loosing vision and hearing. After going outside for fresh air I was instantly clear of these feelings and deducted that I just needed to eat(It was mid day and I didn't eat breakfast and it was too soon for lunch.) Enjoy for everyday pain relief.:)”

“I got a hybrid of this strain crossed this Bruce Banner called Granddaddy Bruce" at the Green Depot in Denver.  I've never had straight Granddaddy Purple before but the indica portion of the hybrid I smoked was very smooth and relaxing
column4: very nice body stone.”"

column3: “Does not cause as much sleepiness as most other indicas. It is very relaxing though.”
“ABSOLUTELY MY FAVE FOR SURE!!!”
“This is one of the best strains I've had but it mad me and my boy HUNGRY AF then After I ate so much I knocked TF out lol I recommend it tho”
“the best”
“A very nice Indica.”
“If you smoke some purp, it dam sure won't hurt lol”
“awesome”
“Great stuff. Had me laughing all night. After about 2 hours, fell right asleep. Smooth stuff.”
“Will completely knock you out of you are looking for a good bed time smoke. completely mellows out your whole body.”
“Beautiful bud and all out good for pain”
“Makes eight people sit on a couch and be able to relax and flow with out saying a word for over 30 min and stay on the couch for two hours”
“It's just plain awesome”
“great for relaxing and taking care of stress. perfect pre-bedtime bud.”
“extra fluffy buds, long lasting high, relaxing & depression releaving. very strong taste and has many medicinal values.”

“slightly skunky with thick smoke that tickle the nose. smells like earthy sweet fresh tires with grape undertones. onset comes on fairly quick both cerebral and physical and tends to mildly snowball into an indica effect. definitely a good choice for pain and rest. a good choice for body relaxation.”
“Gave me a nice relaxed body high right away”
“can't wait to try”
“My all Time Favorite Night Cap!”
“Worked great for anxiety”
“It has a smooth slow coming on it helps me sleep”
“GDP is my favorite med works great for my pain and a enjoyable flavor. 2 great qualities you normally don't find together”
“Good and easy and great Buzz”

“This strain still takes the golden metal for my favorite. I use to help.with many of my issues including depression, anxiety, nausea, severe bone and muscle pain, stress, but most of all INSOMNIA! This always helps me sleep and I've has SEVERE insomnia since birth. It also has a great flavor. I also smoke different bubbas a lot for insomnia but overal this wins in every department.”
“its cool. not as tasty as the og.”

“too sleepy to do anything, makes me feel stupid, lazy, the come down leaves a feeling of depression. But honestly some highly potent shit. great for an end of the day unwind if you don't feel like reading.”
“Fruity taste, decent smoke, very colorful buds. Scent is enjoyable too.”
“Top strain. Supportive indica.”
“Nice purple buds.full of trichromes with a mellow body.Not one of my favs but worth a try.”
“i like it”
“This strain is awesome for pain and helps before bed to provide a nice drift off to sleep and a sounder sleep. Definitely a favorite!!!!!!”
“Damn good, all the way around!!!”

“The smell is intoxicatingly strong. Strong berry scent as well as the most snow powder coating I've ever had. Great high, just sliding into the high, ever so smoothly. A bit of dry mouth, but overall a wonderful treatment for my lower back, my migraines, as well as help with dinner after work. GDP definitely helped keeping hubby happier than usual. Love this strain.”
“good steady mellow cannabis”
“Such a relaxing strain!”
“the best fuckn strain of grass ever”
“This is a powerful indica. You cannot go wrong with GDP.”
“Very nice body high. classic”
“psychoactive yes. i was trippin with visions of reality. we are not what we see.”
“It is very very good!!!”
“This is my new favorite!  Amazing taste and aroma. Relaxing and calming.”
“Amazing strain.. Great uplifter for depression especially for those late night thoughts. Good flavor, great sleep.. overall a great high. Would recommend to any Indica lover”
“That sleepy stuff!”

“A perfect nightcap after an evening of Sativa. Kens GDP. Grown with love. 

Restores balance. So wonderfully peaceful. 

You know Couchlock is setting in and you've got (less than urgent) stuff to do... but Whatev. All feels good. Warm. Simmering and Sensual. Purple.

Thank You. 

Gradually blasting off now... .”
“This was my group's main smoker at Bonnaroo last year.  We had some other stuff but I can't even remember what it was and every time somebody packed a bowl one of us would ask: Is it that Purp?"

column1: That's how I remember this strain”"

column3:
“One of my favorite indicas, great for unwinding before bed at the end of a stressful night. Relaxes the mind and body, while providing a pleasant uplifting mood. Awesome for pain management as well. 

GdP can be quite sedating / sleep inducing if you're already tired, which isn't necessarily a bad thing :)”
“I absolutely love this strain of flower”

“every joint has been injured. neck and shoulders as well. prior to medicating...and i do mean medicating, i can barely move, subsequent to the consumption of GDP i am able to move as though the pain never existed. in all my years being to herb, ive never received this effect. a very mellow high,  also quells anxiety, social anxiety as well as symptoms from PTSD.   #disabled/retired vet         #disabled/retiredcop”
“very mellow, helps with my wife's condition.”
“it was great. I was so relaxed and forgot about all of my stress. I was couchlocked for a few hours but it was fantastic”
“Great night time strain. good for pain and insomnia.”

“First ran into GDP while living in Huntington Beach CA and was very impressive and got even better when the vet got his hands on it and the grape and berry flavors just make your mouth water! Strain is great for medical purposes as well as recreational!”
“Very euphoric with a fulll body high, bery relaxing as well”
“I have tried others  GDP s and this is Awesome!! Great flavor, smooth and fresh. The care of this grow shows from the 1st taste. I'm a 'fan' - Thank You!!”
“It's very smooth, clean, it has a slow lift but an amazing glide. Very good. Would recommend it”
“Fairly on the milder side.”

“Omg I'm smoking granddaddy purp right now and it's truly one favorite strains of weed it's very soothing to me and relaxing. If you having a very stressful day I recommend smoking this strain to relax you and bring you to your center. The aroma is off the hook. Taste like berries seriously.”
“Puffin on tHis concentrate and boy does it taste delicious. The inhale is packed with berry & grape flavor & the exhale is smooth. Must buy if you like purple flowers 🍇”

“I've never been the biggest fan of pure indica but this strain gives you a nice head high for the first 15 minutes or so because it's just so strong. The body high is amazing though and it definitely puts you in the right frame of mind to sit down and just absorb information. For an indica this strain had me thinking pretty deeply into everything I watched/heard. Watching tv or YouTube, or even listening to music is ...”
“Great smoothness, not dry crumble suttle moisture.  Addresses most of what it known for. Hard to stay lit burns out easily. And doesn't stay true to color depending what's on hand.”

“Relaxing, sleep and munchies inducing strain that's great for stress and pain. I should declined
recommend this for people struggling with insomnia and pain.”
“Easily one of the most soothing indicas”
“This one is a heavy indica but has a lovely grape like flavor. Wonderful for cramps and pain and great at helping me sleep.”

“I didn't get much of that grape taste everyone is speaking about. It is more pronounced in Grape Ape. However, this is an enjoyable strain. I smoked it right before going to bed. It started with a head high for about 5 minutes and then suddenly shifted to a full on body stone. Really relaxing. I've been wanting to smoke this strain for almost a year and while I'm slightly underwhelmed, this is still a good one to try...”

“Favorite hands down, dick was rock hard ready to be sucked. Looking for a girl on the back page right now like 
( ͡o ͜ʖ ͡o) ...”
“Nighttime is the right time for Grand Daddy Purple. I recently picked up a Vapen Clear cartridge of this solvent free THC to aid me with a good nights sleep. You down with GDP? Yeah, you know me.”

“This was the first really STRONG strain that I tried, and it was awesome. I have a terrible time with insomnia and this relaxed me so well that I was able to get the best sleep I had experienced in months. Also, I got the giggles a lot with this one, but I think I just get the giggles whenever I'm high. 😉”
“Best strain out there for anti anxiety/stress”
“Perfect night time strain. An all time favorite. Pain and anxiety melt away.”

“As I am writing this, I am high off of old great granddaddy purple. Never in my life have I experienced a high so amazing. This just might be the finest bud ever. I feel connected to the world like some kind of fucking hippy. I'm having full on conversations with myself. My brain feels like a lava lamp.”
“Wonderful. I love this strain. So relaxed but also so motivated and creative. Hits nice and smooth too!”

“Second time is the charm for this strain. Smoked a massive bowl using a bubbler,  was smooth af. Nice taste, felt lovely. I took this to sleep and I was out for hours in deep sleep. Feel totally rejuvenated this morning. Mad respect to this strain, I get it now. Highly recommend.”

“My first born.GDP is the first strain i ever grew.A very resilient strain.Belivere me.I dropped her on her head broke branches,duct taped em back together and still she gave me a great yield.I even N" burned the shit out of her.Cuz i didnt know anything.But the Big almost black buds with bright orange hairs she rewarded me with was the reason i continue to grow today.Overall a great yielder
column4: Smells like grapes.And th...”"

column3: “Super nice body high with a relaxing and euphoric effect. 10/10 recommend to anyone wanting a chill time while stoned.”
“I have all of those symptoms anxiety depression sometime can't sleep very well back and knees ache all the time .”

“amazing. I went outside and took to hits from a pipe, and I didnt feel it yet. after 8 more hits i went in my house, laid down, and I felt like I was blessed by marijuana gods. this is probably the best indica strain I ever had”
“Good but takes way to long to start working.”
“One of the best dab pens ive had in a while. Very present body high. Gave me some munchies.it kind of tasted like watermelon.”
“LOVE! Some of my best highs ever, very happy strain.”
“I absolutely love this strain. Makes me laugh like im stoned for the first time again.”
“This will always be theee #1 strain!”

“Very good strain, I smoked the dab cart concentrated version of the strain and it has a good 🍇 grapey type of flavor to it. Makes you very relaxed and your eyes droop a lot on this strain. Makes you kinda sleepy but not a lot and you feel very couch locked. Would recommend for those who just want to chill out for a lazy afternoon”
“This weed is quite amazing, it escalates your high slowly but gives you the munchies quite badly 🍔🍔🍟🍟”

“Not good for people with anxiety. Hard hitter but not a good high. Like felt like I couldn’t move but didn’t feel relaxed or happy. Weird since it has high ratings. My body just doesn’t agree with the flower. Jack herer and headband on the other hand... ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️”
“My insomnia is finally cured.”
“heavy stone very earthy taste and the grower did an amazing job”

“Very good evening body stone. I noticed towards the end it would make me a bit jittery, but otherwise, a good mellow high. Toke a little too much, and your head gets very sedated for a short period in the beginning, and then it's very relaxing, giggly.”

“That sunrise looks tight / 
With the skyline, I wish a / 
Robot was driving.”

“Still a favorite.  Warm, heavy comfort along with an often profoundly stony high accompanies the powerful pain relief of this strain. The powerful taste and aroma contend with India Pale Ale and Garlic Pizza, but fair warning- when your belly is full, you'll likely fall contentedly to sleep.”
“Take it often for traveling.”

“Never enjoyed smoking because it caused anxiety/paranoia. It caused me to be socially introverted where I'm naturally extroverted. Even alone it caused anxiety just overanalyzing situations in my life. 

I'm a cancer patient wanting to get off opioids but need something strong to relieve body pain, insomnia and to turn off my brain from overthinking overanalyzing life and the stress of a serious illness...but need on...”
“It's the best”
“It definitely relaxes you, but I also got anxious as well.”
“I Love it”
“Great for night time activities..very heady, euphoric high...might have a few giggles along side.”
“Best strain ever, such beautiful flower and taste amazing!”
“Really great stuff, almost a 5 but it's just not strong enough for sleepy time. Pairs well with Girl Scout Cookies if you had those earlier in the day.”

“This strain is my favorite for falling asleep. I take a few hits and drift off into sleep.
GDP relaxes the body and your mind at the same time making it a perfect nightcap.”
“Smoking on it currently, I will say if you have lack of appetite this will make you hungry lol. Overall I do like it & it does its job.”
“Great to relax! Been feeling really calm with it. It gives you a hige hunger!”
“One hit wonder on my first try. It got me good. I was actually speechless (but giggly).”

“This bud is so frosty and pretty. I smoked it from a lil pipe, nothing fancy, and it has a bit of a creeper effect. A little too much and the world gets a bit of an animated quality. I loved this high. Super-stoney in the most enjoyable way.”
“One of the more potent indicas you can get your hands on.”
“Takes a couple bowls but this strain puts being right to sleep Everytime a couple bowls and it's bedtime”

“Probably one of my all time favorite strands. I loved how it made me feel, and it tasted great. When smoking out of a bowl, it hits really hard and makes you cough a lot. It's a really strong strand and will get you baked off of a few hits.”

“probably one of the best strains i’ve had ever. i only smoke at night before bed because my muscles hurt so much and this purp usually takes the pain away, extra points because it’s a gorgeous strain 🤷‍♂️ buy in bulk if u can!!”
“Really helped me sleep with needing to take a sleeping pill.”

“Paranoia/anxious-Free. Just don’t drive right after. 
Very nice taste. Recommended for long runs.”

“definitely a well known strain also really strong. I rolled quite a few blunts with this strain and gotta say the hits I get from this strain are very smooth and has a very strong taste. this strains flavor is also really good, if you like weed but not the taste this strain is definitely a strain for you because granddaddy purp definitely does have a unique taste. the bud is really sticky to the point when you grind ...”
“100% muscle relaxation”
“Had live resin cart from Cresco. Solid flavor as always. It's a heavy indica that makes me very sleepy. I would not suggest using it during the day, unless you want to spend the day asleep.”

Relaxed me but didn’t help me get my zzz’s.
Curaleaf 60% vape cartridge”
“Very magnificent strand.🍇🍇🍇”
“ohhhhhh dadddyyyyyyyyy this sum good weed”
“Perfect indica for those who want to get a well rested sleep!”

“This is easily a 5/5, one of my fav strains. It makes you feel super relaxed (bc its indica) and optimistic. Kiss anxiety and negativity  away when high in this strain. Perfect strain for just vibing out, playing video games (beat mgsv while on this lmao) hanging with friends, listening to music (I'd recommend chilled out hip hop or vaporwave), simple tasks, and even perfect before sleeping. I slept like a baby while...”

“this is some good if you can get your hands on some”
“Nice and smooth.”
“Really taste like grape!”
“The taste leaves something to be desired, but the sheer relaxation of the strain is unique to it.”
“Great for pain relief and a nice body buzz. Hits very smooth. Very nice purple.”

“the high is good for going out side.being in a brightly lit place or outside on a sunny day will make you be in a good mood. things will apperar slightly comical. i dont feel lazy right now and probably wont for another hour. it also helps with anxiety”
“Hella hella high.”
“By far, this is the best bud I have ever smoked.”
“good”
“Give it up to the grandfather. very thick smoke with a sweet taste.  Smoke enough and you'll wake up from a nap you never intended having. Dark Purple and green nugs.  Bomb.”
“loved it”
“Great for bongs because of its leafy texture and chunky grind up little is wasted in downspout”
“Kill.”

“Yeah, this is some pretty amazing stuff... What a great combination of qualities too... For me it relaxes my muscles a bit, relaxes my body quite well, and yet does NOT at all give couch-lock. Happy, almost fun" even... Great anti-anxiety/anti-depressive effects I'd say. It is strangely "energizing" while being a body-relaxer
column4: so it's not a jittery sort of energy
column5: but just a "higher vibration" sorta one... And ta-a-...”"

column3: “First time I ever smoked GDP it was fire. I got some yesterday and smoked 4 bowls and didn't feel a strong high at all, the nugs were small and fluffy not dense at all. It didn't have that strong tell tale grape smell to it, it was very light grape smell and wasn't very fragrant. It did however, put me right to sleep which is what I need it for. So to wrap up  it did the job with a very light high.”
“Very relaxing. Can easily put you to sleep. One one my favorite strains.”
“One of the greatest strands to come through while I've been at college. GDP can knock you right out when all your class work and studying is over. Good stuff.”

“From the first toke, you feel the immediate relief of any pain or soreness you my have. Relaxes you to the point of being able to do things that normally would hurt if other wise not medicaided. Its great before bed. When medicaiding during the day, its best to take 2 to 3 hits or less than you normally would intake, and just give the medicine time to kick in because its pretty potent.”
“I really like the strain of GDP you have, a bit leafy at times, but a very tasty strain that works very well!”

“Im hitting some GDP shatter out of my cloud pen now.  Definitely a very relaxing high.  Also a good smoke before doing any athletic (in my opinion).  It also seems to help a lot with my soreness.  Love this stuff for sure.”
“Had fun with granddaddy. Took a good trip, I was so relaxed and it was just great. Had the munchies bad though lol!”
“Great taste Great color”
“Best so far bongs down blunts up all I can say is wont help to try it smell taste flavor guud.”
“Good ass high”
“GDP is nice.  Even high.  nice in evenings.”

“This is the best bud I've smoked in a loooong time. I'm so happy to have started growing this because it is my favorite, not excluding Death Star. I've had this in the form of edibles and dry herbs and both times were amazing experiences. Next time you visit the clinic make sure to check out granddaddy purp”
“Good long stoned.. Great taste”
“always a decent strain. be careful thpugh, theres a lot of name only" gdp out there that have no p”"

“Really nice buds and a really really nice body high”
“The samples I got match up with every known effect for this strain. The good and the bad.”

“I'm a little bias because this is my favorite strain. It's hands down the best indica you will ever smoke. If you want a heavy high where you find its hard to keep your eyes open this is the strain for you. Beautiful stinky dense buds filled with triochomes. Perfect for the grinder as the kief falls into like snow. I highly recommend this if you truly want to experience marijuana to its fullest effects.”

“The Indica strains are becoming very interesting. 
I smoked and thought about human immunology. The bodies response to an germ invader. What if the response is auto-immune? Yes GdP is very relaxing. A heat throb in the body. It's almost as if your mind is juggling to see what ideas it can settle on. I have my to-do list beside me. This bud is dense and the smoke blows clouds out.”
“Hands down one of my top 5 favs! Great flavor, strong body high, and long lasting effect.”
“amazing”
“I luv da purp taste sooo much!!”

“5 star all the way. awesome strain”

“So this is excellent cannabis.

I mean, holy shit this is great weed.  GDP is a fantastic choice for medical patients with body and mind conditions.  It offers the prospect of very effective relief if utilized properly.

Let's get this out of the way:  anyone who says cannabis is not medicine is uniformed or pushing a fact free bias.  We know the truth, it is in most cases superior to existing pharms or other offerin...”

It just might give my fave heavy indica strain a run for it's money for the heavy indica punch it delivers.”

So, I had a visit with Nathan at The GreenHouse in Glendale, AZ. He was a plethora of information after I explained my li...”

Happy Schmokin'”

“Granddaddy is so overlooked sometimes because of the fact that it is everywhere. But the truth is it is one of the best strains ive ever smoked. I am more of a true sativa head high lover but GDP at night especially if you rip it from a bong. Say goodnight because you will ptfo.”

“Good taste, good quality where I got it from so good look, good smell... great smoke. Caused me to be very well medicated. Worked great on my nerve pain. My pain which usually is a 5 or 6 became a distant and forgotten 1 out of 10; 10 being the worst. If you get the chance, give this a try.”

“awesome”

column3: “Tried Grand Daddy Purple it had lots of trichomes and was dense. This batch had a lemony smell to it, had a real strong citrus aroma. In the light the purple that should come with this strain was in there. The high for me was heady and then move towards my body making me relax. Definitely reccomend this strain for going to sleep or just chilling at home.”

“My first review of this strain a month ago wasn't fair.  I shared about a gram with friends.  This time I rocked a bowl by my lonesome and wow!!!  Heavy couch lock heavy munchies very bad stoned eyes.  only partake late evening DO NOT RUIN IT FOR THE RESTOF US.  Do not smoke and drive.”

An amazing pop of grape aftertaste is present after smoking as well.  Grab a friend if you can, a pillow, kick your...”

column4: I have been sitting at my desk for the past two hours trying to create a subtle puzzle that people will hopefully notice, and try to solve, as part of the ugly sweater design. The idea to even try and create a puzzle wouldn't have come without Grandad...”

column3: “This bud tastes great especially out of my crafty vape. I really like the berry or fruity strains. Nice relaxed but able to focus high. Dry eyes and mouth and the munchies for sure. I gave it a 3 cus for me it does not last very long. I was super stoned for about 25 minutes then totally felt nothing after an hour. Tried out of bong to see if any different unfortunately it was not.”
“Very heavy high, big body relaxing high.... feels like gravity is a bit heavier haha, Prepare to chill after smoking this. Couch pot. #1 best tip- Listen to music!”

“GDP is a good strain, that tastes like chocolate, marshmallow/vanilla. I've had several batches the past few years and none of the wow'd" me. It's definitely an indica high with pain relief and relaxation. Couchlock will be present.  Looks good
column4: tastes better
column5: 4 out of 5 stars.”"

column3: “Being diagnosed with chronic pain for several years, (along with depression, anxiety and insomnia) I was told that I should stick with Indica strains, so this was my introduction to Grandaddy Purple.  I was excited to put all the claims to the test!  Since I'm still new to the exploding world of cannabis, this was going to be my first experience since 1983.  WOW!!  How things have changed!  After just one deep inhale...”

“My father's father died a few years before I was born, and my mother's father died a couple months after I was born. In other words, I've never had a granddaddy. Purple has always been my favorite color too so it's p lit that I've found a new grandfather, with strong purple coloring inside his calyces. 
He gives me pleasantly sedative body highs and a relaxed, happy, carefree mindset. 
The best thing about my new wee...”
“Classic strain with classic relaxing traits. Will absolutely put you to sleep after enough tokes.”
“Great Indica.  Very relaxing but it didn't make me feel overly tired. The flavor wasn't the best but hit wasn't too strong.”

“This is my favorite strand so far. So well-rounded and exactly what I need in weed for medicinal purposes: clears my head of anxiety/racing thoughts, puts me to sleep, makes me less-cynical and moody. Definitely for alone/couch/house purposes.”

“Forever the king of Indicas. The flavor is sweet with intense grape and berry in the exhale. The high is pure sedation, a heavy relaxing body high that will melt you to the closest cushy surface. Guaranteed to melt stress and pain away within minutes. GDP's always my go to in new shops, especially if it's grown by Raven Grass farms!”
“very great”
“Good for insomnia”

“The Grandaddy Purps have been a strain that my friends and I were constantly on the lookout for as a teen. As a patient now who is in need of serious pain relief and sleep aid, this strain lives up to it and then some! 

 It has that sweet berry taste with notes of cherry wood and white peppercorn. There's another flavor profile that truly cannot be figured out, other than to say it tastes like purple" and that's on...”"

“Good night!  Umm......literally!  The only reason for the one star reduction is for lack of daytime usage.  I know for some that would be worth a sixth star.  Reviews are spot on, first 15-30 mins its a racy, cerebral buzz.......but at that same mark, it begins to lay me out like a horse tranquilizer.  Taste is amazing though, very berry-esque and grape like.  Deelicious!  Update, 7 months later:  Still havent had an...”
“this is a good strain if u wanna juss chill”

“Definitely one of my all-time favorites!  A couple of hits off a joint of this one and you’re in the clouds for hours! Very relaxing, and puts huge smile on my face. One of my top recommendations for anyone that loves Indica.”
“One of my favorites. Great for insomnia”

“At first I couldn't tell if I was high. If what I'm smoking is in fact Granddaddy Purple, it gives more of a body high than anything else. 
It's not really an intense high so much as it's relaxing and lethargic. The effects I'm feeling are somewhat consistent with what most reviewers had posted. I'm not really an expert when it comes to some of the gimmicky names that are given to smoke, so I've no real way of ident...”
“GDP in SF is not that great, or at least, I have not enjoyed it much.”

“GDP an old favorite and carries a high that consistently keeps me happy whenever I smoke this classic.  A treat when I can find it closer to home.  A real keeper for season affective disorder  suffers.”
“First time smokin i smoekd thsi tastes amazing and smells like heaven. This is the best weed ive ever smelled and one of my favorites to smoke too.”
“For real a very nice strain with great taste and buzz does very well in both indoor and outdoor gardens. Up there in my favorites of all time”
“Piff shit”

“Tried this strain after hearing about the hype. to be honest it was the worst weed i have ever smoked (And i rarely find strains i don't like). First it tasted horrible, second the high was not enjoyable, and last but not least the high was short.”
“Was great for Anxiety and stress good for traveling and sitting for long time! I loved the taste and it was a level high not to slow or too fast nice and even body hi!”

“Definitely berry type taste sweet pungent smell
Smoke  is a really night long enjoyable high”
“It was not as purple as I would have liked, but non the less amazing.”
“GDP is straight up some of the best smelling bud I've ever had! it alleviates my headaches and puts me in a great mood I have no complaints about it except why isn't it legal?!?”
“grower has this stuff it the best!!!:) gdp all day”
“Taste like fruity pebbles if grown rite an the best high ever it will floor u”
“Tasted amazing loved it”
“love it. helps my chronic pain and insomnia.,”
“Perfect for anxiety. Very chill.”
“This is a good strain to just kick back and smoke bowls too. Very relaxing strain.”
“Very powerful strain. Intense body high and decent mind high. I felt like I was outside of my body after smoking this all night lol”
“GDP is a classic example of perfection!  Heavy high I always feel relaxed and the way I need to. Definitely a smoke n nap kinda flower.”
“aye best fuckin bud I had in months yo”
“Great strain, works wonders for my anxiety.... High-ly recommend”
“Excellent!”
“Very short high for me but it's really intense while it lasts. Not the worst bud for me”
“Very nice, seems a bit subtle, but perhaps my supply isn't very potent. Definitely grape smelling and a bit in taste. Smooth and mellow, a very good night time choice for staying stationary. ☺”
“ento ivi”

“Tastes like purple, made me very hungry and happy.

There's a very strong aroma that tastes... indica-ish?”
“Sweet, citrusy taste & smell. Thick smoke.”

“Couch lock indeed!  Felt a nice high within a minute or two after the 1st hit.  Two hits and several minutes later I was super stoned.  I suggest taking it slow with this strain because it will put you down for the count.  Taste is great, but a little rough on the throat.  If you're looking for pain relief at the end of the day, this is your go to strain.”
“I've never felt so connected with the earth and everything else around me. this is a special strain I'll hold dear to my heart 💚”
“Heavy very nice body high.”
“Pretty pleased with this, so far. Not my favorite... But, it does the trick.”

“Ken eptes gdp is a perfect night time smoke . Great flavor, beautiful buds, it has it all. Saying that I'm just tired of purple" strains . Recently it seems every new flower has "purple (insert name here)" and I'm just done with the taste of purp strains .  This strain was my fav like 10 years ago - far better indica choices”"
“definitely one of the best strains in the fields. so much flavor. and it definitely puts you to sleep. insomniac recommended.”

“Fantastic strain.  I smoke this and get couch locked instantly.  It's hella great when you are trying to get to sleep quickly.  I once fell asleep with half a bowl left in my hand (after smoking several before).”
“One of my favorite indicas. The purple hue it has is just simply beautiful!”
“absolute favor”
“I feel really good. I love the buds big structure. The smell is so sweet. It really does work for insomnia and depression the best.”
“Very distinct berry flavor and smooth on the lungs:) certainly a must try indica”
“This is one of my favorite strains, its very good for my back pains and headaches, though i am a heavy sativa user this strain is one if the best”
“Best strain around super dank its real gdp”
“Got it from a guy at a thing called blues on the green and honestly my new favorite”
“My favorite indica for a reason! Never fails and love the deep purple and grape taste and smell. Perfect for pain and sleep”

“He's not what you think...  A weird perverted old man.

Thanks you Leafly! For helping me find this strain!  Smells very scrumptious and tastes just as good as it smells.  Strong indo, I get the impression it has some of my favorite breed, King Louis XIII, in its lineage because of the scent and taste.

I have to say, GDP seriously is for a good nights sleep.  I suffer from insomnia and have tried every pill that doe...”
“Serious head high. Love the smell and taste. Hold that hit and exhale out the nose. So nice😎”

“This is fruity, Menthol, Skunky, kushy, fuely, Chemy, And grape with citrus  and pine, very complex, very potent. One of my top favorites but make sure you get the Kush Dominant Phenotype! Veneta OR 24.5% THC in July.”
“can leave you a little stupid, but a very smooth and soothing high. tastes delicious through a vape. Great for summer bike rides!”
“definitely an ol skool strain....ewould perfer a strain to tranquilize me more but for the ladys or for pain taste great and has appeal :)”
“I have smoked granddaddy purple on a very regular basis because it's one of the most generic" weeds you can find. Yes it gets you high
column4: yes it chills you out
column5: yes you'll love it. I don't like grape as a flavor personally
column6: only reason I gave it 3/5 stars”"

column3:
“I love GRAND DADDY PURP
It's personally one of my favorite strains it's great for stress and works wonders if you need to relax”
“There is a unique pungency to this strain. When you've had it, you'll never forget it. Very sweet and strong. Get some”
“Sooo chill”
“I suffer from excruciating cramps, taking medication does nothing for me. However this strand does quite the job at numbing the pain. Putting me right to sleep !”

“This is the type of Indica strain that I really enjoy. tasty, smooth smoke with a rich aroma.  it has a bit of a woody roasted flavor to me. I do get a hint of sweet but faint. the high is nice and relaxing. no jitters with this one.”

“Does give a very strong body high and will make you feel exhausted quite fast. My first time with an Indica as far as I know and I didn't particularly like it. A high is a high but I guess Indicas aren't my thing. Smelt very strong of berries with a little bit of a sweetness to it which WAS nice. I didn't feel the hunger as much as other people did. A very nice strain if you are into indicas.”
“It's yummy”
“Oh, me likey. Cracking open the container you get a subtle berry aroma. Very pleasing. The THC content of my strain was around 23%. And man, that is a very nice 23%. It says to me, Oh
column4: you like that? How about tthhhhiiisssssss....?" More of a body high for me. When inhaling
column5: the flavor somehow becomes ... peppery? Spicy? Probably a new first choice strain.”"

column3: “Pretty bomb, I agree that if you can fight off falling asleep its a pretty nice high. Really relaxing, good for a day where you just wanna sit on the sofa.”

“One of my favorite Indicas to have on hand. Beautiful flower with deep purple leaves that taste and smells amazing. Great end of the day relaxation/couch lock. Good for body pain and insomnia as well. Highly recommended.”
“Ridiculously bright purple and potent. This strain gets me feeling good and relaxed and settles down into some sleep motivation. Amazing sweet taste and smell. Heavy hitter indica.”
“This was an incredible night cap to my day ! Really gave the full body effects I was looking for and helped with easing me to sleep”
“Is a very good strain. Relaxes you very much. Helps with pain also. Has a good taste.”
“good tasting weed i liked it overall 8/10 had a berry taste to it made me really hungry good luck!!!!”
“holy fuck! loved it”
“Great strain for an end of the day relaxation!”
“strong and sleepy”
“top strain. so tasty and great high”
“I've always wanted to try this strain, never shows up in Barrie”
“A lovely, relaxing feeling that will have you couch or bed bound. GDP is a great thing to do if you're overwhelmed with stress or anxiety. Don't smoke this if you need to get stuff done”
“Very nice flavor and excellent smoke. Had me on the sluggish side.”

“The Batch i recieved  looked really similar to the pictures here however my rating for this strain is average iust average. The strain burned really quickly , looked dry and felt dry when packing it into a bowl. I forgot to mention the cotton mouth effect this strain had on us.”

“Brilliant strain! Very noticeable psychoactive effects. Very focusing. Makes you feel almost super aware, but not anxious or paranoid. Full body relaxation. All my joints feel tingly. I can feel the tension being drawn out of my knees and elbows. Even though my mind is very active, I'm perfectly happy to just melt into the couch. Seemed to take just a bit more to get to the sweet zone of the high than with Blue Dream...”
“I love GDP top 5 fave all time. FYI giving tree wellness  in Mesa has good GDP RIGHT NOW.”
“Best relaxer. just a perfect body high. the crashcisnt as heavy so it won't knock you out to the point you don't remember. This strain taste good and let's you relax before going to sleep”
“Tasty and easy going. Helped me relax and go to bed.”

“been since 2006 i smoked GDP untill today. i remeber why.. Its a bery strong indica. unfortunately it only put me out for the rest of the day and now im left catching up. nevertheless it was well needed therefore it always receive the five stars that it deserves. if this is your first time smoking GDP I would highly consider finishing your daily stuff before playing around with the purp.”
“what's not to like”
“Really nice. Nice flavor”

“I wanted a strain a bit more mellow, after Purple Afghani and Hindu Kush made me too anxious and gave me a rapid heart beat. half a hit of this from a co2 cartridge (from the co2 company) and it is just fine. a little strong at first but after aböut 20 minutes it settles into a nice high.”
“If you have eating problems, this strain delivers full extent to your gustatory glands and tasting the best of foods and specific flavors.”
“A staple for indica lovers. Uniquely grape taste with orange and purple hairs.”
“i really enjoy this strain. i have fibromyalgia and my neck is always hurting because of my central nervous system over loading.”
“My favorite strain very good tasting and long lasting buzz don't make plans if your gonna smoke this bud”
“Got some Grand Daddy Purple yesterday I must say one of my favorites friends to look at  , very smooth just an all-around great strain”
“I just got this strain yesterday and it has been a very relaxing strain. I highly recommend I'd you're looking for a good night sleep.”
“This strain was great.  Dealt with pain, got a good nights sleep.  Concentrated on body gave no head buzz. The staff is great and willing to spend time with you to answer your questions.”

“Classic MJ, can't go wrong with this happy/mellow indica high. My personal top favorite. This is the kind of weed that will turn your thoughts into movies in your head, good pot for doing something creative towards the end of the night.”
“agreeded swept my long time smoking behind off my feet and strat to bed”
“GNP has strong euphoric and calming effects.  It helps my pain and helps relax my body.”
“This is a great strain, there is a little bit of a headache for me though.”
“Very productive high. You think you can be active but that's when you feel the couch lock. Very comforting high and also relaxing. Would recommend for first timers for sure”

“Hands down my favorite strain! It's well Known for its sweet body high and amazing ability to relieve pain. 

I have horrible insomnia. If I'm lucky I'll get three hours. This strains gives me a full nights rest and relaxes me as well. 

It smells of sweet white grapes and berries. The smoke tastes like blueberries with a hint of sage on the exhale. 

Don't pass up on this beauty :)”
“Can't go wrong the granddaddy! Very useful for relaxation and a good night sleep. Loved it at first toke! 😎🍁”

“GDP the purple cream was grown with a lot of love ashed white like a snow cone.Tasted like a Grape cotton candy light smoke was very enjoyable in West Valley with F16's flying overhead nice clear sky.Buds were golf ball bud's trimmed very well.A lot of care put into flower.

 5mg b.i.d. 1:1 tinture subligulal sitting 0/10 anxiety or 0/10 pain.
Great feeling life can't get any better living the dream.”
“Very heavy indica with delicious grape taste. Super potent with lasting body effects. Great for managing pain and boosting appetite.”
“Its great. Smokes tastes like a cigar store smells, think old man wearing old spice and a leather jacket. Feals heavy and easy to sleep afterward.”
“can't sleep? try this. Amazing relaxing type of high. couch lock seriously.”

“Classic strain that absolutely does the trick. I'm wild about this indica, it works wonders for anxiety and insomnia. This strain stands out because of its obvious relaxing effects that are evident right away after consumption.”

“I remember when I first had this strain around 2004. Been smoking it ever since. Whenever I can get my hands on a good batch I splurge. Great for appetite and relaxation. If you've had a long day, this is your go-to!”
“Veryyy sleepy. One of my favorite relaxers! Excellent for pain and appetite loss!”
“One of the best buds in my book , burns great the high was very euphoric”
“Only took me a single inhale to sleep a solid 8 hours for the first time in years!  I'm starting to feel human again!  Thank you Granddaddy Purple!”
“Supet bomb!”
“GDP is bomb slow cerebral  effect definitely  a couch potato  thanks for at least having one of my favorites”
“Easy to grow, nice yield.  Not as strong as other strains but great buzz!  Very relaxing, mellow....everything I look for in a medicine.”
“This does great things for my stress! Love love love it!”

“My friend used to go on about this strain.. I didnt care for it. Its was ok but nothing special. Short lasting and mild for pain. I might have been spoiled by the Tangerine Dream I had before it. Cause Tangerine Dream is awesome.”

“A strong & heavy body high. It starts at the head and moves down over the rest of the body, following through to the neck onto the rest of your body into a fully relaxed space around you for a heavy stoned couch lock 15 minutes into it. The benefits I could see it being used for medical are pain management and depression. It puts you into a head space where 'giving a shit' isn't important so don't look to finish any ...”

“Fellow Potheads Gdp Is Most Def A Must Cop...Ya Know I Love Classics And GDP A Real OG...Looks Beautiful Like Wala Beautiful...Yep That Bit Bad...Breaks Down Very Well Fluffy Like Almost...Smells Good And Smokes Well...Def Some Gas The Body High Creep In There After A While...Def In The Upper Echelon Of Gas..Gotta Get It”
“Tastes good, hits well, good after taste . munchies munchies! big time munchies.  fast hitting. On it now, very chill. Go with the flow, hang out kind of feel.”

“I know why people won't stop raving about this strain. It is basically an indica that will make you deflate into your couch just like Sara. Forget paying attention or being concentrated, you're just a little happy puddle of goo. Good for back to school when you're all done for the day and want to calm down. I wouldn't try to do any social activity on this. In the vape, the taste is good and what I had vaped thoroughl...”
“Last time I got this I was amazed by the tasty citrus flavor”
“Nice strain. Sweet citrusy taste and good smell. Excellent for relaxing or sleeping. Fairly strong too.”

“~This deep Purple Bud streaked with brown/yellowish pistils,
will get you high instantly about 30 seconds after inhaling the euphoria and tingles hit, 
~after 5 minutes of riding home on cruiser skateboard, a since of mumbled thoughts, thinking really fast about a lot not realizing what the last thought was, or remember what just happened, 
~i went to the gym so it had me feeling more motivated to feel the pain be...”

“gotta love my gdp”
“Soooo good tasting. Smoke it all day.”

“I do not care for this one at all. The smell was really good but the taste is bad. Harsh kind of oily. The feeling was just ok I don't know I just didn't like it let me feeling uncomfortable. But I'm not a fan of purples usually.”
“sweet, sweet! catching zzzs”
“didn't get much of the grape taste as I was looking forward to, but non the less was good pain reliever and relaxant”
“Not a 10 by any means but definitely a good all-around buzz.”
“Granddaddy Purp never fails. You're not tripped out but you can feel it at times because it's a potent indica. Smoke enough and your floor will feel like a mattress.  Go GDP!”

“All I have to say is WOW!! HerbalMatch.org is the S***! Ryan is an awesome person to have a chat with, while remaining professional and discrete at all times. This was my first meeting with Ryan @ HerbalMatch.org, so I wanted to write a complete and accurate review so I apologize for the length.

I had spoke with Ryan a few time before coming to my house and he was a complete professional throughout the whole entir...”
“intense body high”
“This is my go-to strain when I need to sleep hard and stay down most of the night. GDP is great for late night rest.”

“just tried this last night for the fist time and it was something else. The heavy indica body high was completely relaxing and sleep inducing without any negativity. Perhaps I've been wrong thinking indicas don't work for me. Would only work in the eve for me as it had a more mellow morphine type effect. I could feel my face slightly hanging on my skull, haha. In a good way.”

“Let me start of by saying that i stumbled onto this strain a few years back, and i was not that impressed by the buds and or the high. I just recently found  it in my hands once again, and i couldn't be happier. The high is very relaxed, and i often forgot what i was doing but with a few laughs and smiles, i found what the thought buried deep in my scattered and accepting mind. I usually enjoy music, and playing my g...”

“Hands down one of the best......the high itself is only half of this strains greatness
the taste of the smoke is amazing and so is the smell very sweet sugary taste just like lavender”
“This was great. Well taken care of plants, and the purple genetics are obvious.”
“pretty good stuff”
“Beautiful purple buds. Very dense and sticky. Like a glob.”
“Great strain, used with a launch box. wonderful aftertaste and a great choice if you have trouble sleeping. 9/10 would smoke again.”
“favorite indica. Very stoney”
“Relaxing couch lock buzz , good strain to chill out or use before sleep good if u have anxiety”

“Relaxation. Pain-relief. Smooth. Potent. Anti-anxiety. EXCELLENT! 
This might be my favorite strain so far. I've been prescribed medical marijuana for severe back pain due to accidents and stress/anxiety. I was able to wake up this morning without having to take Aleve! 
Bonus: relaxed/sleepy feeling after a long day yet still able to get a boost of creative energy for a 1/2 session of photo-editing.  :-)”
“VERY GOOD DECENT PAIN RELIEF”
“Awesome bud i love it XD very joyful happy high”
“This strain made me trip..very strong lingering euphoria that hits you..”
“fabulous. my second time smoking it and its beautifully unique. my friends and I smoked just a bowl pack and were ripped. its storming, I can't feel a single old injury ache. stress gone. love it”

“Great strain for nervous (or socially awkward) artists or comedians! Good substitute for booze! Smoking too much'll put you to sleep though, one bong rip'll do you good! (Berry flavor comes out strongest through blunts)”
“the ultimate straight. for the ultimate day. the ultimate high. a great time”
“One, if not, my favorite strain. Smooth, sweet, with an excellent high. Love purple!”
“Love this strain! Makes me feel very calm and happy; breath of fresh air! NO PAIN!! Not extremely sleepy, but I got a great night's sleep.”
“great strain. got me super stoned i love it”
“One of the first strains I've tried, not the best, but still pretty good.”
“Good stuff”
“made me hungry af.”
“Bomb fruity taste”
“Perfect for after a long day. It definitely helps me unwind. Everything that was running through my brain before goes away”

“Got some from a buddy to try it was really dark purple and had flecs of orange it and it's super stinky and a great taste I loved it I feel really relaxed and it does great for every day aches and pains”
“Absolutely astounding. Gave me the most intense body high I've ever had. Works wonders for my back pains.”
“This strain felt like a full body muscle relaxer. I enjoyed it.”
“Love this strain probably one of my favorites!”
“The Best Sleep Aid 💤”
“Love this stuff. When I sit in for the night with the stereo going and just winding down, this is just great.”
“I got an eighth of GDP Shatter and it's awesome! The high is so heavy, immediately feeling my eyes get low an muscles ease up. The smell is sweet and pungent, you're gonna get faded off this one.”
“Smooth taste”
“Pretty cool”
“Looks amazing, smokes great. Made me hyped up”

“I'm giving this 5 stars because it is a great overall indica. Hits fast, smooth, tastes great. It's what I'm looking for. Did not get rid of all my lower back pain but the rest of my mind and body were set after 3 hits off my bong. If you like indica you will like this!!! A lot of it had me sleeping as most indica will do.”

“Super chill relaxed, all over extreme body high. Smile.
Life is good.”
“Grapey, heavy, delicious.”
“good 🚬”
“effective body buzz, euphoria.”
“this is my first time smoking this strain and it's pretty awesome. feel chilled out and relaxed, give it a 10/10”
“Deep THC sedation without paranoia, munchies may be problematic, most ideal for insomniacs. Strong mellow high with moments of enlightenment. Excellent indica.”
“I like to get low... Really low. This strain is great for the melting into a puddle of golden goo feeling. Who needs to move... I don't.”
“My #1! Granddaddy Purps is my main man!”
“My nightime go-to!”
“this is good for night time. 15 mins after smoking i get a sleepy high”
“Super bomb!! No head change, just a hard hitting high that makes you feel no pain and super lazy. Awesome strain for people with anxiety :) Sit back and relax, now go to sleep!!”
“Such a fun relaxing high. Tastes great and smells good too! A good bud to share with a bud!”

“A favorite due to nostalgia and effects. Have tried 4 batches, and 2 have been especially excellent. The most recent was great for nighttime use, and provided relief for muscle tension, spasms, stress and insomnia.”
“Very relaxing with a floating body high.”
“Great bud. The taste is very grape/berry. Get a relaxed high, definitely couch-lock. I will surely keep this in my cabinet.”
“Good stuff”
“Had a smooth flavor, no harshness.  Has a good mildly skunky scent.  Good indica.”
“It was ok. Not my favorite indica. Other indicas I only need one or two hits, this one took awhile to kick in. Super dry mouth btw!”
“Best weed ever !!!!! Put u on ya ass I love it taste great too”

“Picked up a few grams of GDP yesterday after work at the treehouse club in Spokane, was looking for a strong indict to help with lack of sleep and it killed it for me! Got great rest without feeling groggy in the morning.”

“Wow GDP is one of the staple Indica's. This one gave me couch lock and the munchies so be prepared to allot some free time for your therapy. Pain relief, relaxation/sleepiness, and appetite are the three main medicinal effects I experienced. Anyways try GDP if you are an Indica person or want to change it up! 5/5 staple strain. Top shelf bud.”

“really euphoric great taste would recommend for daytime consumption very strong would hit from paper or blunt  bong rip it in the morning after about an ounce your eyes will ache a little and u get tired”
“Good strain.  Pretty potent and big high.  The munchies on this one was out of control.  Dry mouth.  Taste was great!”

“This strain is very helpful for pain, insomnia and lack of appetite. I would most likely purchase again but only if I had a little pineapple express or green crack first as I am partial to sativa for my cancer pain but I will give it 3.5 out of 5”
“Breaks down fine but not much needed.  Very strong strain will knock you out if you're sleepy.”
“Absolutely love the taste very refreshing! you can't go wrong with the purp”

“Full flavor full strength full effectiveness for multiple diseases and disorders.  This very potent strain is a prime genetic for whole body and mind health and wellness.  Bright orange hairs dense compact buds with strong aromatics.  Flavor profiles of sweet dark grapes and skunk.  Very thick potent smoke with stoning yet energizing properties.  This is a great pain and inflammation relieving herb.  Great for energi...”

“So okay, it's purple.... Lol I got a bunch of this from my LP in hopes it would be delicious. I've had it before from Toronto and it was dank asf, however when I opened my bottle of it I was disappointed. I got this at 23.4 percent THC. It was an alright buzz for about 2-3 hours. That's after a doob and a couple of bongs. 
About a month later I got only a little bit more of this, I haven't opened it yet. But I'm hopi...”
“love it”
“Gdp is by far my favorite strain. It's amazing for headache relief and this strain keeps me super calm and focused. Love it,”
“Let me just say this strain is superb.  I love my batch of GDP that smells so grapey with wood and earth also noticeable.  good at night ! :)”
“Smoking this right now and it got me choked. hahaha.”
“nothing Beats a great strain of some FIRE GDP top 3 Indica always a FAV for Indica lovers”
“Not usually an indica smoker but I thought I'd give this a shot. lots of couch lock and tons of munchies before crashing out for the night. Did not feel very cerebral to me personally.”

“One of the smoothest vapes I've ever tried. Sweet with a grape/berry flavor. You don't end up coughing or choking at the end of it. I use this to help with fibromyalgia and it's perfect to vape just before bed. It makes you relaxed and sleepy. I feel no pain at all!”

“This is some very good weed. Got some GDP a few weeks ago.  Probably the best weed I've had in years, pre 502. Two-three hits and I was very buzzed and relaxed.  I usually smoke before bedtime and GDP really puts me into dreamland.  Just one hit and it's a nice light buzz good for socializing and conversation.  On the con side of things it does give me really bad dry mouth and a case of the munchies.”

“By far one of my favorite strains. Definitely great for hanging out with friends and passing the blunt around. It's hard to come by on the east coast but if you can get your hands on some do it. #goodgrowin”
“It makes me really happy and this is such a heavy indica I slept for 12hours”

“Another Favorite Indica! 
miracles happen with good flowers”
“Gets you super stoned and after the climax of the high I get super dizzy and disoriented /: this has never happened to me before but it's not a good feeling 😂”
“great relaxing and aphrodisiac herb;  lovely purp”
“this continues to be my favorite strain. it's so euphoric and calm together. it's truly impeccable. i love it 🌀”
“GDP gives an extremely relaxing euphoria. Conversation flows easily as the body melts into pure Indica bliss. This would be my choice for every evening if it was more readily available.”

“Was exactly like i expected very beautiful purple and orange haired silver grazed green buds what a sight especially next to my mix of keif looked like incredible hulk colors , hit very smooth and nice helped relax in the night”
“Help with the stress and I just got out of a car accident so I'm sore but with this it's just way better and it's fast and taste great and you really don't need much if it's from a great grower.”

“one of my favorite strains
good for sleep”

“this strain is great.  im sure my batch could be better, so just fir now im rating it 4 until i can get it stronger possibly.  the buds are beautiful dense green with purple blotches. coated in crystal resin. and extremely bright beautiful purple inside. smells strictly of grape and fruit.  tastes wonderful.  a burst of comfortable uplifting  euphoria. it can help you laugh and sleep your night away.  i love it. but ...”
“I thought this would help with pain and mellow high and it didn't. I won't be getting this again”
“been my go to BHO for a while. Nothin beats the flavor or the high. very relaxin and can be sedating in larger doses. GDP fan for liiife.”
“Really basic, great relaxing weed!”
“Great for a lazy Sunday, Awesome flavor and phenomenal on the body”
“Its so great. I bought 10g's off my guy and he threw in an extra 3. Its so potent. Its so freshhhhh”
“Gdp is one of my favorite Indicas. Tastes almost as good as it looks. Will definitely help patients suffering chronic pain. AZCS is my go for Gdp!”
“Best ever always a phenomenal high great sleep also taste like rich berries with a pinch of pungent”
“The very best strain I have had so far! I love it! Unfortunately it is rarely available to me! It helped my pain and helped me sleep!”

“Maybe it's just cuz I loved my Grandfather so much, or maybe it's cuz purple is my favorite color but I love this strain! Fruity like grapes with a little skunkiness and all your usual indica --wait, can you believe that Leafly doesn't have indica" in their spell-check dictionary? Developers? Webmaster? There's a dark conspiracy here
column4: spell check does not like this word indica. I love indicas almost as much as I lov...”"

column3: “Very very smooth and relaxing”

“Dentro de las medicinales esta es excepcional porque no solo ayuda a dormir como ángel sino que controla los dolores de artritis, mejora el apetito y la nausea y es una gran variedad para quimioterapia, sin un efecto psicodisleptico o narcótico tan fuerte como la OG, esta logra inducir un sueño placentero y relajante. 
Ideal para personas mayores con molestias reumáticas o personas en quimio.”
“This strain is amazing. Hands down one of my all time favorite indicas. The flavor is out of the world!! Perfect for relaxing after a stressful day and listening to some tunes on blast.”
